GSP33brssgo3u:320_0: tathāhi pratyakṣā śrutiḥ sānuśayānāmavarohaṃ darśayati- 'tadya iha ramaṇīyacaraṇā
GSP33brssgo3u:320_1: abhyāśo ha yatte ramaṇīyāṃ yonimāpadyeranbrāhmaṇayoniṃ vā kṣatriyayoniṃ vā vaiśyayoniṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:320_2: vātha yaiha ka pūyacaraṇāṃ abhyāśo ha yatte kapūyāṃ yonimāpadyerañśvayoniṃ vā sūkarayoniṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:325_0: smṛtirapi 'varṇā āśramāśca svakarmaniṣṭhāḥ pretya karmaphalamanubhūya tataḥ śeṣeṇa
GSP33brssgo3u:326: kecittāvadāhuḥ - svargārthasya karmaṇo bhuktaphalasyāvaśeṣaḥ kaścidanuśayo nāma bhāṇḍānusārisnehavat /
GSP33brssgo3u:327: yathāhi snehabhāṇḍaṃ ricyamānaṃ na sarvātmanā ricyate bhāṇḍānusāryeva kaścitsnehaśeṣo 'vatiṣṭhate tathānuśayo 'pīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:334: yathā kila kaścitsevakaḥ sakalaiḥ sevopakaraṇai rājakulamupasṛpaścirapravāsātparikṣīṇavahūpakaraṇaśchatrapādukādimātrāvaśeṣo na rājakule 'vasthātuṃ śaknoti /
GSP33brssgo3u:339: na svargaphalasya karmaṇo nikhilasya bhuktaphalatvaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:341: svargārthaṃ kila karma svargasthasyaiva svargaphalaṃ nikhilaṃ na janayati svagracyutasyāpi kañcitphalaleśaṃ janayatīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:345: natviha tathā svargaphalasya karmaṇo leśānuvṛttirdṛśyate nāpi kalpayituṃ śakyate svargaphalatvaśāstravirodhāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:348: yadihi yena sukṛtena karmaṇeṣṭādinā svargamanvabhūvaṃstasyaiva kaścidekadeśo 'nuśayaḥ kalpyeta tato ramaṇīya evaiko 'nuśayaḥ syānna viparītaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:352: yaduktaṃ yatkiñcetyaviśeṣaparāmarśātsarvasyeha kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalopabhogenāntaṃ prāpya niranuśayā avarohantīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:355: yatkiñcidiha kṛtamāmuṣmikaphalaṃ karmārabdhabhogaṃ tatsarvaṃ phalopabhogena kṣapayitveti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:356: yadapyuktaṃ prāyaṇamaviśeṣādanārabdhaphalaṃ kṛtsnameva karmābhivyanakti tatra kenacitkarmaṇāmuṣmiṃlloke phalamārabhyate kenacidasminnityatvaṃ pratyuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:357: apicakena hetunā prāyaṇamanārabdhaphalasya karmaṇo 'bhivyañjakaṃ pratijñāyata iti vaktavyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:358_0: yathaiva tarhi prākprayāṇādārabdhaphalena karmaṇā pratibaddhasyetarasya vṛttyudbhavānupapattirityevaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:359: nahyanārabdhaphalatvasāmānyena jātyantaropabhogyaphalamapyanekaṃ karmaikasminprāyaṇe yugapadabhivyaktaṃ sadekāṃ jātimārabhata iti śakyaṃ vaktuṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:361: nāpi kasyacitkarmaṇaḥ prāyaṇe 'bhivyaktiḥ kasyaciduccheda iti śakyate vaktum /
GSP33brssgo3u:364: smṛtirapi viruddhaphalena karmaṇā pratibaddhasya karmāntarasya ciramavasthānaṃ darśayati- 'kadācitsukṛtaṃ karma kūcasthamiha tiṣṭhati //
GSP33brssgo3u:366_0: yadi ca kṛtsnamanārabdhaphalaṃ karmaikasminprāyaṇe 'bhivyaktaṃ sadekāṃ jātimārabheta
GSP33brssgo3u:368: naca dharmādharmayoḥ svarūpaphalasādhanādisamadhigame śāstrādatiriktaṃ kāraṇaṃ śakyaṃ saṃbhāvayatum /
GSP33brssgo3u:369: naca dṛṣṭaphalasya karmaṇaḥ kārīryādeḥ prāyaṇamabhivyañjakaṃ saṃbhavatītyavyāpikāpīyaṃ prāyaṇasyābhivyañjakatvakalpanā /
GSP33brssgo3u:372: yathāhi pradīpaḥ samāne 'pi saṃnidhāne sthūlaṃ rūpamabhivyanakti na sūkṣmam /
GSP33brssgo3u:373: evaṃ prāyaṇaṃ samāne 'pyanārabdhaphalasya karmajātasya prāptāvasaratve balavataḥ karmaṇo vṛttimudbhāvayati na durbalasyeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:388: tat tatrāvarohatāṃ jīvānāṃ madhye iha karmabhūmau ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ puṇyakarmaṇaḥ iti yat tat ābhyāśoha avaśyaṃ hītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:393: yathetamityārabhya śvādiyonimityantaṃ vākyaṃ yāvattāvadāmnāyata iti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo3u:394: atra yāvatsaṃpātamiti viśeṣaṇādramaṇīyacaraṇā iti vākyācca saṃśayamāha-tatreti /
GSP33brssgo3u:398: teṣāmiṣṭādikāriṇāṃ yadā tatkarma paryavaiti viparikṣīṇaṃ bhavati tadā punarāvartanta iti śrutyantareṇāpi kṛtsrakarmaṇaścandraloke bhuktatvamucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:400: ayaṃ naro yatkiñcidiha loke karma karoti tasyāntaṃ phalaṃ paraloke prāpya karmārthaṃ punarāyātīti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:405: tat tatrāvarohatāṃ jīvānāṃ madhye ye kecidiha karmabhūmau ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ puṇyakarmāṇaḥ puṇyayonibhāja iti yat tat abhyāśo ha avaśyaṃ hītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:408: 'puṇyo vai puṇyena karma bhavati pāpaḥ pāpena'ityādiśāstreṇa sukhaduḥkhayordharmārdharmahetukatvamavagatam /
GSP33brssgo3u:409: tataśca janmārabya dṛṣṭo bhogaḥ karmahetukaḥ bhogatvāt,
GSP33brssgo3u:412: smṛtavāśramāḥ āśramiṇaḥ pretya mṛtvā lokāntare karmaphalaṃ bhuktvā tataḥ śeṣeṇa bhuktādanyena karmaṇā anuśayākhyena punarjanma pratipadyante iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:413: viśiṣṭā deśādayo medhāntā daśa guṇā yeṣu te tathoktāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:416: kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ svarge bhoge sati bhuktasya karmaṇo leśo 'nuśayastadvānavarohati bhāṇḍe snehaleśasya dṛṣṭatvāt,
GSP33brssgo3u:419: nanu bhoganāśyatvāt karmaṇo leśo na yuktaḥ iti śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:420: kṛtsnakarmaṇo bhoge jāte nāśaḥ syāt, natu bhogo jāta iti parihārārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:429: kṣapayitvā punarāgacchantīti prāpyantamiti vākyena gamyata iti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo3u:431: yatkiñceti yāvatsaṃpātamiti ca sāmānyaśabdayorāmuṣmikaviṣayatvena saṅkoco nyāyya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:436: ārabdhavadanārabdhasyāpi balavataḥ pratibandhakatvānna sarvakarmaṇaḥ phaladānāyābhivyaktiriti samādhatte-yatheti /
GSP33brssgo3u:438: astu tarhi durbalasya karmaṇo nāśa ityata āha-nāpīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:439: nābhuktaṃ kṣīyate karmetyekānta utsargaḥ sa ca prāyaścitabrahmajñānadhyānairbādhyate na maraṇamātraṇetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:448: kiñca vyañjakatve 'pi maraṇasya kiṃ sarvakarmavyañjakatvaṃ kalpyate uta yatkiñcitkarmavyañjakatvam /
GSP33brssgo3u:452: maraṇaṃ na kasyacidapi karmaṇo vayañjakaṃ kintu prabalakarmapratibandhābhāve durbalaṃ vyajyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:456: evaṃ sarvakarmasaṅgha ekajanmārambhaka ityaikabhavikaḥ karmāśaya iti matanirāsamupasaṃharati-tasmāditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:460_0: avarohamārga itthaṃ śrūyate-'tasmin yāvatsaṃpātamuṣitvā athaitamevādhvānaṃ punarnivartante
GSP33brssgo3u:460_1: yathetamākāśamākaśādvāyuṃ vāyurbhūtvā dhūmo bhavati dhūmo bhūtvābhraṃ bhūtvā megho
GSP33brssgo3u:460_2: bhavati bhūtvā pravarṣati ta iha vrīhiyavā oṣadhivanaspatayastilamāṣā iti jāyante
GSP33brssgo3u:460_3: ato vai khalu durniṣprapataraṃ yo yo hyannamatti yo retaḥ siñcati tadbhūya eva bhavati
GSP33brssgo3u:461_0: dhūmādyadhvanā yathetaṃ yathāgataṃ tathetamadhvānaṃ punarāyantītyuktvā dhūmādirūpapitṛmārgastharātryādikaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:461_1: noktamadhikaṃ cābhrādikamuktamiti matvā sūtrakṛtoktaṃ yathetamanevaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:466: caraṇād iti cen nopalakṣaṇārtheti kārṣṇājiniḥ | BBs_3,1.9 |
GSP33brssgo3u:473: śrutiśca karmācaraṇe bhedena vyapadiśati- 'yathākārī yathācārī tathā bhavati' (bṛ. 4.4.5)
GSP33brssgo3u:476: yānyasmākaṃ sucaritāni tāni tvayopasyāni' (tai. 1.11.2) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo3u:482: anugrahaśca jñānaṃ ca śīlametadvidurbudhāḥ'iti smṛtāvuktāvadrohādayaḥ śāstrārthajñānarūpaṃ śīlaṃ sarvakarmāṅgamuktaṃ tadbodhakaṃ caraṇapadamaṅginaḥ śrautādikarmaṇo lakṣakaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:483: karmaṇa evottarāvasthā dharmādharmākhyāpūrvamiti karmalakṣaṇayaiva tadabhinnāpūrvākhyānuśayasiddhiriti kārṣṇājinimatam //9//
GSP33brssgo3u:487: ānarthakyam iti cen na tadapekṣatvāt | BBs_3,1.10 |
GSP33brssgo3u:489: kasmātpunaścaraṇaśabdena śrautaṃ śīlaṃ vihāya lākṣaṇiko 'nuśayaḥ pratyāyyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:490: nanu śīlasyaiva śrautasya vihitapratiṣddhasya sādhvasādhurūpasya śubhāśubhayonyāpattiḥ phalaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssgo3u:496: nahi sadācārahīnaḥ kaścidadhikṛtaḥ syāt- 'ācārahīnaṃ na punanti vedāḥ' ityādismṛtibhyaḥ puruṣārthatve 'pyācārasya nānarthakyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:497: iṣṭādau hi karmajāte phalamārabhamāṇe tadapekṣa evācārastatraiva kañcidatiśayamārapsyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:501: nahi padbhyāṃ palāyituṃ pārayamāṇo jānubhyāṃ raṃhitumarhatīti // 10 //
GSP33brssgo3u:503: caraṇaśabdavācyasyaiva grahaṇasaṃbhavānna lakṣaṇā yukteti śaṅkitvaiva brūte-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:505: kiñca śīlasya niṣphalatvāyogācchrutayonyāpattistasyaiva phalaṃ nānuśayasyetyāha-avaśyaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:506: vedāstadarthakarmāṇyācāraṃ vinā na phalantīti smṛtyā śīlasya karmāṅgatvānna pṛthakphalāpekṣā,
GSP33brssgo3u:509: aṅgasya phalāsaṃbhavena mukhyārthasyācārasya grahaṇāyogāllakṣaṇā yukteti samādhānārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:510: yadyācārasya snānādivat puruṣasaṃskāratayā puruṣārthatvaṃ tadāpyavirodha ityāha-puruṣārthatve 'pīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:512: astu tarhi śīlakhyācārādeva yonyāpattirityāśaṅkya 'puṇyo vai puṇyena karmaṇā'ityādi śrutyā virodhānnaivamityāha-karma ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:518: bādaristvācāryaḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛte eva caraṇaśabdena pratyāyyete iti manyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:520: tathāhi- aviśeṣeṇa karmamātre caratiḥ prayujyamāno dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:521: yo hīṣṭādilakṣaṇaṃ puṇyaṃ karma karoti taṃ laukikā ācakṣate dharmaṃ caratyeṣa mahātmeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:524: tasmādramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ praśastakarmaṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇā ninditakarmāṇa iti nirṇayaḥ // 11 //
GSP33brssgo3u:527_0: yadyapyakrodhādirūpaṃ śīlaṃ sādhāraṇadharmātmakaṃ viśeṣarūpāt karmaṇo 'bhinnaṃ tathāpi
GSP33brssgo3u:527_1: caraṇācāraśabdau karmavācināveva na śīlavācakāviti na lakṣaṇāvasara iti bādarimataṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:529: karmaṇa evācāratve yathākārītyādibhedoktiḥ kathamityata āha-bhedavyapadeśa iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:531: atastatsamabhivyāhṛtaḥ karmasāmānyavācako yathākārīti śabdastaditaraviśeṣaparaḥ evamanavadyāni karmāṇīti sāmānyataḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:540: ye tvitare 'niṣṭādikāriṇaste 'pi kiṃ candramasaṃ gacchantyuta na gacchantīti cintyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:541: tatra tāvadāhuḥ - iṣṭādikāriṇa eva candramasaṃ gacchantītyetanna /
GSP33brssgo3u:544: ethāhyaviśeṣeṇa kauṣītakinaḥ samāmananti- 'ye vai ke cāsmāllokātprayanti candramasameva te sarve gacchanti' (kauṣī. 1.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:547: iṣṭādikāriṇāmitareṣāṃ ca samānagatitvaṃ na yuktamiti cet /
GSP33brssgo3u:550: evaṃ puṇyātmanāṃ gatyāgaticintayā vairāgyaṃ nirūpya pāpināṃ taccintayā tannirūpayati-aniṣṭādikāriṇāmapīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:552: 'vaivasvataṃ saṃgamanaṃ janānām'iti śruteśca saṃśaye prathamādhikaraṇena siddhaniyamākṣepasaṃgatyā pūrvapakṣasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-tatretyādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:553: yamarājaṃ pāpijanānāṃ samyaggamyaṃ, haviṣā prīṇayateti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:554: pūrvapakṣe puṇyavatāmeva candragatiriti niyamābhāvāt puṇyavaiyarthyaṃ pāpādvairāgyādārḍhyaṃ ceti phalaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:555: siddhānte pāpināṃ candralokadarśanamapi nāstīti puṇyārthavattvaṃ vairāgyadārḍhyaṃ ceti phalam /
GSP33brssgo3u:561: saṃyamane tv anubhūyetareṣāmārohāv arohau tadgatidarśanāt | BBs_3,1.13 |
GSP33brssgo3u:567: yathā kaścidvṛkṣamārohati puṣpaphalopādānāyaiva na niṣprayojanaṃ nāpi patanāyaiva /
GSP33brssgo3u:570: te tu saṃyamanaṃ yamālayamavagāhya svaduṣkṛtānurūpā yāmīryātanā anubhūya punarevemaṃ lokaṃ pratyavaronti /
GSP33brssgo3u:573: tathāhi yamavacanasarūpā śrutiḥ prayatāmaniṣṭādikāriṇāṃ yamavaśyatāṃ darśayati- 'na sāṃparāyaḥ pratibhāti bālaṃ pramādyantaṃ vittamohena mūḍham /
GSP33brssgo3u:574: ayaṃ loko nāsti para iti mānī punaḥ punarvaśamāpadyate me' (kaṭha. 2.6) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:575: 'vaivasvataṃ saṃgamanaṃ janānām' ityevañjātīyakaṃ ca bahveva yamavaśyatāprāptiliṅgaṃ bhavati // 13 //
GSP33brssgo3u:577: saṃyamane yamaloke yamakṛtā yātanā anubhūyāvarohantītyevamārohāvarohāviti yojanā sūtrasya jñeyā /
GSP33brssgo3u:579: samyak parastātprāpyata iti saṃparāyaḥ paralokaḥ tadupāyaḥ sāṃparāyaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:581: viśeṣato vittarāgeṇa mūḍhaṃ mohātpramādaṃ kurvantaṃ prati na bhāti /
GSP33brssgo3u:582: sa ca bālo 'yaṃ strīvittādiloko 'sti na paraloko 'stīti mānī /
GSP33brssgo3u:584: pāpināṃ yamavaśyatāvādiviśeṣaśrutismṛtibalāt'ye vai ke ca'ityaviśeṣaśrutiriṣṭādikāriviṣayatvena vyākhyeyeti bhāvaḥ //13//
GSP33brssgo3u:589: apica manuvyāsaprabhṛtayaḥ śiṣṭāḥ saṃyamane pure yamāyattaṃ kapūyakarmavipākaṃ smaranti nāciketopākhyānādiṣu // 14 //
GSP33brssgo3u:595: apica sapta narakā rauravapramukhā duṣkṛtaphalopabhogabhūmitvena smaryante paurāṇikaiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:602: yāvatā teṣu rauravādiṣvanye citraguptādayo nānādhiṣṭhātāraḥ smaryanta iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:606: yamaprayuktā eva hi te citraguptādayo 'dhiṣṭhātāraḥ smaryante // 16 //
GSP33brssgo3u:612: ityasya praśnasya prativacanāvasare śrūyate- 'athaitayoḥ pathorna katareṇacana tānīmāni kṣudrāṇyasakṛdāvartīni bhūtāni bhavanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:613: jāyasva mriyasvetyetattṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ tenāsau loko na saṃpūryate' (chā. 5.10.8) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:617: vidyākarmaṇī hi devayānapitṛyāṇayoḥ pathoḥ pratipattau prakṛte /
GSP33brssgo3u:618: 'tadya itthaṃ viduḥ' iti vidyā tayā pratipattavyo devayānaḥ panthāḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:619: 'iṣṭāpūrte dattam' (chā. 5.10.1,3) iti karma tena pratipattavyaḥ pitṛyāṇaḥ panthāḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:621: etaduktaṃ bhavati- ye na vidyāsādhanena devayāne patyadhikṛtā nāpi karmaṇā pitṛyāṇe teṣāmeṣa kṣudrajantulakṣaṇo 'sakṛdāvartī tṛtīyaḥ panthā bhavatīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:624: te 'pi candrabimbamāruhya tato 'varuhya kṣudrajantutvaṃ pratipatsyanta iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:627: apica sarveṣu prayatsu candralokaṃ prāpnuvatsvasau lokaḥ prayadbhiḥ saṃpūryetetyataḥ praśnaviruddhaṃ prativacanaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:628: tathāhi prativacanaṃ dātavyaṃ yathāsau loko na saṃpūryate /
GSP33brssgo3u:633: śrutistu tṛtīyasthānasaṃkīrtanenāsaṃpūraṇaṃ darśayati- 'etattṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ tenāsau loko na saṃpūryate' (chā. 5.10.8) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:638: ye vai kecidadhikṛtā asmāllokātprayanti candramasameva te sarve gacchantīti // 17 //
GSP33brssgo3u:643: etayorvidyākarmaṇoḥ pathidvayasādhanayoranyatareṇāpi sādhanena ye narā na yuktāste janmamaraṇāvṛttirūpatṛtīyamārgasthāni bhūtāni bhavanti,
GSP33brssgo3u:645: tena pāpināṃ candragatyabhāvāccandraloko na saṃpūryata iti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:648: apica pāpināṃ candragatau asau lokaḥ saṃpūryeta 'ataśca na saṃpūryate'ityetatprativacanaṃ viruddhaṃ prasajyetetyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:650: avaroha eva tṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ śrutyuktamityata āha-avarohasyeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:660: na tṛtīye sthāne dehalābhāya pañcasaṃkhyāniyama āhutīnāmādartavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:662: tathāhyantareṇaivāhutisaṃkhyāniyamaṃ varṇitena prakāreṇa tṛtīyasthānaprāptirupalabhyate 'jāyasva mriyasvetyetattṛtīyaṃ sthānam' (chā. 5.10.8) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:666: apica pañcamyāmāhutāvapāṃ puruṣavacastvamupadiśyate nāpañcamyāmāhutau puruṣavacastvaṃ pratiṣidhyate,
GSP33brssgo3u:668: tatra yeṣāmārohāvarohau saṃbhavatasteṣāṃ pañcamyāmāhutau deha udbhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssgo3u:682: dhṛṣṭadyumnādīnāṃ tu yoṣitpuruṣaviṣaye dve apyāhutī na staḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:684: balākāpyantareṇaiva retaḥsekaṃ garbhaṃ dhatta iti lokarūḍhiḥ // 19 //
GSP33brssgo3u:691: apica caturvidhe bhūtagrāme jarāyujāṇḍajasvedajodbhijjalakṣaṇe svedajodbhijjayorantareṇaiva grāmyadharmamutpattidarśanādāhutisaṃkhyānādaro bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:695: 'aṇḍajāni ca jarāyujāni ca svedajāni codbhijjāni ca 'itiśrutyavaṣṭambhena sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-apiceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:700: nanu 'teṣāṃ khalveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ trīṇyeva bījāni bhavanti aṇḍajaṃ jīvajamudbhijjam' (chā. 6.3.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:701: atra trividha eva bhūtagrāmaḥ śrūyate kathaṃ caturvidhatvaṃ bhūtagrāmasya pratijñātamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:707: sthāvarodbhedāttu vilakṣaṇo jaṅgamodbheda ityanyatra svedajodbhijjayorbhedavāda ityavirodhaḥ // 21 //
GSP33brssgo3u:710: anayā śrutyā cāturvidhyaṃ kathamuktaṃ śrutyantare trīṇyevetyavadhāraṇavirodhāditi śaṅkottaratvena sūtramādatte-nanvityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:713: udakaṃ bhittvā jāyate yūkādi jaṅgamamiti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:722_1: vāyirbhūtvā dhūmo bhavati dhūmo bhūtvābhraṃ bhavatyabhraṃ bhūtvā megho bhūtvā pravarṣati' (chā. 5.10.5) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:730: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - ākāśādisāmyaṃ pratipadyanta iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:731: candramaṇḍale yadaṃmayaṃ śarīramupabhogārthamārabdhaṃ tadupabhogakṣaye sati pravilīyamānaṃ sūkṣmamākāśasamaṃ bhavati tato vāyorvaśameti tato dhūmādibhiḥ saṃpṛcyata iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:742: evaṃ pāpināṃ gatyāgatī vicārya saṃpratīṣṭādikāriṇāmavarohe viśeṣamāha-sābhāvyāpattirūpapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:744: nivṛttāścānuśayinaḥ karmānte drutadehā ākāśaṃ gatā ākāśasadṛśā bhavanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:745: ākāśasādṛśyānantaraṃ piṇḍīkṛtā atisūkṣmaliṅgopahitāḥ vāyunetastataśca nīyamānā vāyusamā bhavanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:746: so 'nuśayī saṃgho vāyusamo bhūtvā dhūmasaṃgatastatsamo bhavati, dhūmasamo bhūtvābhrasamo bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:748: mehati siñcatīti vṛṣṭikartā meghastatsamo bhūtvā varṣadhārādvārā pṛthivīṃ praviśya vrīhiyavādirūpo bhavatīti siddhāntagatyā śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:750_1: tu dugdhaṃ dadhi bhavatītyādiprayoge bhavatiśrutervikārasvarūpāpattau mukhyatvāt
GSP33brssgo3u:753: samāno bhāvo dharmo yasya tadbhāvaḥ sābhāvyaṃ sāmyamiti sūtrapadārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:771: tathāhi vrīhyādibhāvāpatteranantaraṃ viśinaṣṭi- 'ato vai khalu durniṣprapataram'
GSP33brssgo3u:775: tadatra duḥkhaṃ niṣprapatanaṃ pradarśayanpūrveṣu sukhaṃ niṣprapatanaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:780: uktaṃ sādṛśyamupajīvya loke gantṛṇāṃ cirāciragatidarśanātsaṃśayaṃ vadan pūrvapakṣayati-tatretyādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:782: siddhānte tu vrīhīyavādibhāvādanuśayināṃ vilambena nirgamanamiti viśeṣādākāśādibhāvācchīghraṃ nirgama ityavilambena yonyāpattirityanusaṃdhānādvairāgyadārḍhyamiti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:783: nanvākāśādiṣvanuśayināṃ sukhaṃ vrīhiyavādiṣu duḥkhamiti duḥśabdādbhāti na cirāciranirgamanamityata āha-sukhaduḥkhatāviśeṣaścāyamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:790: tasminnevārohe pravarṣaṇānantaraṃ paṭhyate- 'ta iha vrīhiyavā oṣadhivanaspatayastilamāṣā iti jāyante' (chā. 5.10.6)
GSP33brssgo3u:792: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimasminnavadhau sthāvarajātyāpannāḥ sthāvarasukhaduḥkhabhājo 'nuśāyino bhavatyāhosvitkṣetrajñāntarādhiṣṭhiteṣu sthāvaraśarīreṣu saṃśleṣamātraṃ gacchantīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:800: yathā śvayoniṃ vā sūkarayoniṃ vā camḍālayoniṃ veti mukhyamevānuśayināṃ śvādijanma tatsukhaduḥkhānvitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:801: evaṃ vrīhyādiṣu saṃsargamātramanuśayinaḥ pratipadyante na tatsukhaduḥkhānvitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:803: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ anyairjīvairadhiṣṭhiteṣu vrīhyādiṣu saṃsargamātramanuśayinaḥ pratipadyante na tatsukhaduḥkhabhājo bhavanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:811: yathākāśādiṣu pravarṣaṇānteṣu na kañcitkarmavyāpāraṃ parāmṛśatyevaṃ vrīhyādijanmanyapi /
GSP33brssgo3u:813: yatra tu sukhaduḥkhabhāktvamabhipraiti parāmṛśati tatra karmavyāpāraṃ ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇā iti ca /
GSP33brssgo3u:814: apica mukhye 'nuśayināṃ vrīhyādijanmani vrīhyādiṣu lūyamāneṣu kaṇḍyamāneṣu pacyamāneṣu bhakṣyamāṇeṣu ca tadabhimānino 'nuśayinaḥ pravaseyuḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:815: yo hi jīvo yaccharīramabhimanyate sa tasminpīḍyamāne pravasatīti prasiddham /
GSP33brssgo3u:824: iha bhūmau varṣadhārādvārā patitāste 'nuśayino vrīhyādisāmyena jāyanta iti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:825: atra jāyanta iti śruteḥ pūrvatrākāśādivarṣāntasādṛśyokteśca saṃśayamāha-tatreti /
GSP33brssgo3u:830: siddhānte vrīhyādisaṃśleṣamātraṃ parihartuṃ yatnalāghavaṃ vairāgyadārḍhyaṃ ceti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:831: nanu dehotpattyā jīvānāṃ janma syānna svataḥ, vrīhyadestu na dehatvamityata āha-sthāvarabhāvasyeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:836: kratvarthahiṃsāderapi hiṃsātvādisāmānyena pravṛtterna hiṃsyādityādiśāstraniṣiddhatvākāreṇa duritāpūrvakāritvamaviruddhamiti sāṅkhyā āhuḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:837: śruto 'tra vrīhyādibhāvo 'nuśayināṃ na janyarūpaḥ karmaviśeṣaparāmarśaṃ vinātroktatvāt,
GSP33brssgo3u:839: pūrvavaditi padaṃ dṛṣṭāntatvena hetvaṃśatvena ca vyākhyātaṃ yadatra prakaraṇe karmaviśeṣaparāmarśakamucyate tajjanmeti vyatirekadṛṣṭāntamapyāha-yatra tviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:840_0: apica 'yo yo hyannamatti yo retaḥ striyāṃ siñcati tadbhūya eva bhavati'iti vākyaśeṣe
GSP33brssgo3u:849: aśuddham iti cen na śabdāt | BBs_3,1.25 |
GSP33brssgo3u:850: yatpunaruktaṃ paśuhiṃsādiyogādaśuddhamādhvarikaṃ karma tasyāniṣṭamapi phalamavakalpata ityato mukhyamevānuśayināṃ vrīhyādijanmāstu tatra gauṇī kalpanānarthiketi tatparihriyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:852: ayaṃ dharmo 'yamadharma iti śāstrameva vijñāne kāraṇam /
GSP33brssgo3u:854: yasmindeśe kāle nimitte ca yo dharmo 'nuṣṭhīyate sa eva deśakālanimittāntareṣvadharmo bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:855: tena śāstrādṛte dharmādharmaviṣayaṃ vijñānaṃ na kasyacidasti /
GSP33brssgo3u:856: śāstrācca hiṃsānugrahādyātmako jyotiṣṭomo dharma ityavadhāritaḥ sa kathamaśuddha iti śakyate vaktum /
GSP33brssgo3u:857: nanu 'na hiṃsyātsarvā bhūtāni' iti śāstrameva bhūtaviṣayāṃ hiṃsāmadharma ityavagamayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:863: tena na tasya pratirūpaṃ phalaṃ jātisthāvaratvam /
GSP33brssgo3u:867: vaidikaṃ karmāśuddhaṃ na bhavati śāstravihitatvāditi sūtrārthaṃ prapañcayati-ayaṃ dharma ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:868_0: śucau deśe prātaḥ sāyaṅkāle jīvanādinimitte kṛtamagnihotraṃ dharmo bhavati sa evāśucideśe
GSP33brssgo3u:868_1: madhyarātre maraṇādinimitte kṛtaḥ sannadharmo bhavatīti nirṇayaḥ śāstraikasādhya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:870: nanu yā hiṃsā so 'dharma ityutsargasya viśeṣavidhinā bādho 'tra na yuktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:873: ayamarthaḥ-kāmye karmaṇi sarvatra karaṇāṃśe rāgataḥ pravṛttiḥ, aṅgeṣu vidhita iti sthitiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:874: tathāca śyenākhye karmaṇi niṣedhe 'pi rāgaprābalyāt pravṛttiḥ syāt kratvaṅgahiṃsādau tu vidhita eva pravṛttirvācyā /
GSP33brssgo3u:875: sa ca vidhiryadyutsargaprāptamanarthahetutvaṃ na bādheta tarhi pravartako na syāt,
GSP33brssgo3u:880: pratirūpaṃ duḥkharūpaṃ tasya phalaṃ neti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo3u:886_1: retaḥsigbhāva āmnāyate - 'yo yo hyannamatti yo retaḥ siñcati tadbhūya eva bhavati' (chā. 5.10.6) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:893: tatrānnasthānuśayino retaḥ sekakartṛtvāyogādyogamātraṃ vācyaṃ tadvadupakrame 'pi yoga evāstheyaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:899: atha retaḥsigbhāvasyānantaraṃ yonau niṣikte retasi yoneradhikaśarīramanuśayināmanuśayaphalopabhogāya jāyata ityāha śāstram - ''tadya iha ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ' (chāya 5.10.7) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:900: tasmādapyavagamyate nāvarohe vrīhyādibhāvāvasare taccharīrameva sukhaduḥkānvitaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:904: evaṃ karmiṇāṃ gatyāgatisaṃsāro durvāra ityanusandhānāt karmaphalādvairāgyaṃ tattvajñānasādhanaṃ siddhamiti pādārthamupasaṃharati-iti siddhamiti //27//
GSP33brssgo3u:905: iti śrīmadparamahaṃsaparivrājakācārya śrīmadgovindabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ tṛtīyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
GSP33brssgo3u:916: atikrīnte pāde pañcāgnividyāmudāhṛtya jīvasya saṃsāragatiprabhedaḥ prapañcitaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:919: ityupakramya 'na tatra rathā na rathayogā na panthāno bhavantyatha rathānrathayogānpathaḥ sṛjate' (bṛ. 4.3.10) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:920: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ prabodha iva svapne 'pi pāramārthikī sṛṣṭirāhosvinmāyāmayīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:922: saṃdhyamiti svapnānamācaṣṭe, vede prayogadarśanāt 'saṃdhyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ svapnasthānam' (bṛ. 4.3.9) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:925: kutaḥ - yataḥ pramāṇabhūtā śrutirevamāha 'atha rathānnathayogānpathaḥ sṛjate' (bṛ. 4,3.10) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:928: uktavairāgyasādhyastattvaṃpadārthaviveko vākyārthajñānasādhanamasmin pāde nirūpyata iti pādayorhetusādhyabhāvasaṃgatimāha-atikrānta iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:930: asmin pāde 'na sthānato 'pi'ityataḥ prāguddeśyatvena prathamaṃ jijñāsitatvaṃpadārtho 'vasthādvārā vivicyate,
GSP33brssgo3u:932_0: tatra pūrvaṃ gatyāgaticintayā jāgradavasthā nirūpitā tadanantarabhāvinīṃ svapnāvasthāṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:932_1: śrutyuktāṃ viṣayīkṛtya tatra svapne rathādisṛṣṭyuktestadabhāvokteśca saṃśayaṃ vadan
GSP33brssgo3u:933: svapnarathādayo jāgradrathādivat vyāvahārikasattākā uta śuktirajatavat prātītikā iti saṃśayārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:937: mumūrṣoḥ sarvendriyopasaṃhārādetallokānanubhavo sati vāsanāmātreṇa imaṃ lokaṃ smarataḥ karmabalādhṛdaye manasā paralokasphūrtirūpaḥ svapno bhavati,
GSP33brssgo3u:939: tathāca śrutiḥ-'tasmin saṃdhye sthāne tiṣṭhannete ubhe sthāne paśyati idaṃ ca paralokasthānaṃ ca'iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:940: ayaṃ svapnaḥ kādācitka ityarucyā nityasvapnasya prabodhasaṃprasādasaṃdhibhavatvamuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:942_0: daivacakṣurādyajanyatadvattvaṃ martyalokalakṣaṇaṃ ca svapne 'stīti lakṣaṇato lokadvayasparśitvāt
GSP33brssgo3u:943: na kevalaṃ śrutyā svapnārthānāṃ vyāvahārikasatyatvaṃ kintu sakartṛkatvādapītyāha-sa hi karteti //1//
GSP33brssgo3u:948: apicaike śākhino 'sminneva saṃdhye sthāne kāmānāṃ nirmātāramātmānamāmananti- 'ya eṣa supteṣu jāgarti kāmaṃ kāmaṃ puruṣo nirmimāṇaḥ' (ka. 5.8) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:949: putrādayaśca tatra kāmā abhipreyante kāmyanta iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:954: iti prakṛteṣu tatra tatra putrādiṣu kāmaśabdasya prayuktatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:957: ityādi, tadviṣaya eva ca vākyaśeṣo 'pi- 'tadeva śukraṃ tadbrahma tadevāmṛtamucyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:958: tasmiṃllokāḥ śritāḥ sarve tadu nātyeti kaścana'' (ka. 5.8) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:959: prājñakartṛkā ca sṛṣṭistathyarūpā samadhigatā jāgaritāśrayā tathā svapnāśrayāpi sṛṣṭirbhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo3u:960: tathāca śrutiḥ - atho khalvāhurjāgaritadeśa evāsyaiṣa iti yāni hyeva jāgratpaśyati tāni suptaḥ (bṛ. 4.3.14)
GSP33brssgo3u:963: kiñca svapnārthāḥ satyāḥ, prājñanirmitatvāt, ākāśādivaditi sūtrārthamāha-apicetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:965: yaḥ supteṣu nirvyāpāreṣu karaṇeṣu jāgarti tadeva śukraṃ svaprakāśaṃ brahmetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:988: nahi suptasya jantoḥ kṣaṇamātreṇa yojanaśatāntaritaṃ deśaṃ paryetuṃ viparyetuṃ ca tataḥ sāmarthyaṃ saṃbhāvyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:989: kvacicca pratyāgamanavarjitaṃ svapnaṃ śrāvayati kuruṣvahamadya śayāno nidrayābhiplutaḥ svapne pañcālānabhigataścāsminpratibuddhaśceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:990: dehāccedapeyātpañcāleṣu pratihudhyeta na tānasāvabhigata iti kuruṣveva tu pratibudhyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:991: yena cāyaṃ dehena deśāntaramaśnuvāno manyate tamanye pārśvasthāḥ śayanadeśa eva paśyanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:992: yathābhūtāni cāyaṃ deśāntarāṇi svapne paśyati na tāni tathābhūtānyeva bhavanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:994: darśayati ca śrutirantareva dehe svapnam- 'sa yatraitatsvapnyayā carati' ityupakramya 'sve śarīre yathākāmaṃ parivartate' (bṛ. 2.1.18) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:996: yo hi vasannapi śarīre na tena prayojanaṃ karoti sa bahiriva śarīrādbhavatīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:998: kālavisaṃvādo 'pi ca svapne bhavati rajanyāṃ supto vāsaraṃ bhārate varṣe manyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1000: nimittānyapi ca svapne na buddhaye karmaṇe vocitāni vidyante /
GSP33brssgo3u:1002: rathādinirvartane 'pi kuto 'sya nimeṣamātreṇa sāmarthyaṃ dāruṇī vā /
GSP33brssgo3u:1006: ratho 'yamiti hi kadācitsvapne nirdhāritaḥ kṣaṇena manuṣyaḥ saṃpadyate manuṣyo 'yamiti nirdhāritaḥ kṣaṇena vṛkṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1007: spaṣṭaṃ cābhāvaṃ rathādīnāṃ svapne śrāvayati śāstram - ''na tatra rathā na rathayogā na panthāno bhavanti' (bṛ. 4.3.10) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:1013: svapnarathādayaḥ prātītikā jāgradrathādau kḷptasāmagrīṃ vinā dṛṣṭatvācchuktirūpyādivaditi siddhāntayati-tuśabda ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:1014_0: cinmātraniṣṭhāvidyā cittvāvacchedena jīve 'pi sthitā rathādyākārā māyeti sūtrabhāṣyayoruktā
GSP33brssgo3u:1014_1: māyāvidyayorabhedajñāpanāya mātrapadena tu sati pramātaryabādhyatvarūpasya vyāvahārikasatyatvasya nirāsa uktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1018: saṃvṛte saṅkīrṇe, paryetuṃ gantuṃ, viparyetumāgantuṃ, śrāvayati prabuddho janaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:1021: yatra kāle svapnyayā vṛttyā carati tathā svaśarīre yatheṣṭaṃ caratītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1023: kulāyāddehāt bahirivāmṛta ātmā caritvā yatra kāmaṃ yatheṣṭamīyate viharatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1026: evaṃ sati śrutiyuktibhyāṃ antareva svapne satītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1028: atra rātrisamaye 'pi ketumālādivarṣāntare vāsaro bhavati iti bhārata ityuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:1033: sūcakaśca hi śruter ācakṣate ca tadvidaḥ | BBs_3,2.4 |
GSP33brssgo3u:1037: tathāhi śrūyate - 'yadā karmasu kāmyeṣu striyaṃ svapneṣu paśyati /
GSP33brssgo3u:1039: tathā puruṣaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇadantaṃ paśyati sa enaṃ hanti ityevamādibhiḥ svapnairacirajīvitvamāvedyata iti śrāvayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:1040: ācakṣate ca svapnādhyāyavidaḥ - 'kuñjarārohaṇādīni svapne dhanyāni kharayānādīnyadhanyāni' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1042: tatrāpi bhavatu nāma sūcyamānasya vastunaḥ satyatvaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:1045: yaduktam 'āha hi' iti tadevaṃ sati bhāktaṃ vyākhyātavyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:1048: evaṃ nimittamātratvādevātsupto rathādīnsṛjate sa hi karteti cocyate,
GSP33brssgo3u:1051: apica jāgarite viṣayendriyasaṃyogādādityādijyotirvyatikarāccātmanaḥ svayañjyotiṣṭvaṃ durvivecanamiti tadvivecanāya svapna upanyastaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1052: tatra yadi rathādisṛṣcivacanaṃ śrutyā nīyeta tadā svayañjyotiṣṭvaṃ na nirṇītaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:1053: tasmādrathādyabhāvavacanaṃ śrutyā rathādisṛṣṭivacanaṃ tu bhaktyeti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:1057: śrutyantare 'svayaṃ vihatya svayaṃ nirmāya svena bhāsā jyotiṣā prasvapiti' (bṛ. 4.3.9)
GSP33brssgo3u:1059: ihāpi 'ya eṣa supteṣu jāgarti' (ka. 5.8) iti prasiddhānuvajjīva evāyaṃ kāmānāṃ nirmātā saṃkīrtyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1060: tasya tu vākyaśeṣeṇa tadeva śukraṃ tadbrahmeti jīvabhāvaṃ vyāvartya brahmabhāva upadiśyate - 'tattvamasi' (chā. 6.9.4)
GSP33brssgo3u:1071: svapnasya bhrāntimātratve tatsūcito 'pyarthaḥ satyo na syāditi śaṅkottaratvena sūtrāntaraṃ vyācaṣṭe-māyetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:1072: mantreṇa devatānugraheṇauṣadhisevayā vā svapnaḥ satyasūcakāścet satyāḥ syurityata āha-tatrāpi bhavatu nāmeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1074_0: yathā kṛṣidvārā lāṅgalasya gavādijīvananimittatvaṃ tathā svapnabhokturadṛṣṭadvārā
GSP33brssgo3u:1074_1: svapnasṛṣṭinimittatvaṃ na tu kumbhaṃ prati kumbhakārasyeva sākṣād svapnakartṛtvaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:1075: tathāca svapnasya sakartṛkatvaṃ mukhyaṃ nāstīti hetvasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1082: dvitīyasūtroktaprājñakartṛkatvaheturapi svapnasya kiṃ śrutisiddha uta prājñasya sarveśvaratvāt siddhaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:1086: svena bhāsā svīyabuddhivṛttyā svena jyotiṣā svarūpacaitanyena ca svapnamanubhavatītyarthathaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1087: na kevalaṃ bṛhadāraṇyake jīvasya svapnakartṛtvaṃ śrutaṃ kintu kāṭhake 'pītyāha-ihāpīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1089: evaṃ hetoḥ śrutisiddhatvaṃ nirasya dvitīyamaṅgīkaroti-na cāsmābhiriti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1090: tarhi hetusiddheḥ svapnasya satyatvamityāśaṅkya satyatvaṃ vyāvahārikaṃ pāramārthikaṃ veti vikalpya vyavahārakāle bādhadarśanāt,
GSP33brssgo3u:1093: kastarhi svapnasya jāgrato viśeṣo 'tra kathyata ityāśaṅkya prātibhāsikatvamityāha-prāgiti //4//
GSP33brssgo3u:1097: parābhidhyānāt tu tirohitaṃ tato hyasya bandhaviparyayau | BBs_3,2.5 |
GSP33brssgo3u:1099: tatraivaṃ sati yathāgnivisphuliṅgayoḥ samāne dahanaprakāśanaśaktī bhavata evaṃ jīveśvarayorapi jñānaiśvaryaśaktī,
GSP33brssgo3u:1106: kutaḥ - tato hīśvarāddhetorasya jīvasya bandhamokṣau bhavataḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1108: tathāca śrutiḥ - 'jñātvā devaṃ sarvapāśāpahāniḥ kṣīṇaiḥ kleśairjanmamṛtyuprahāṇiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1109: tasyābhidhyānāttṛtīyaṃ dehabhede viśvaiśvaryaṃ kevala āptakāmaḥ' (śve. 1.11) ityevamādyā // 5 //
GSP33brssgo3u:1110: pūrvaṃ kḷptasāmagryabhāvāt svapno māyetyuktamayuktaṃ satyasaṅkalpamātreṇāpi satyasṛṣṭisaṃbhavāditi śaṅkāṃ kṛtvā pariharan sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-athapi syādityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:1111: satyasaṃkalpasya hi saṃkalpātsṛṣṭiḥ satyā bhavati jīvasya tvasatyasaṃkalpatvaṃ pratyakṣamiti parihārārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1113: nāstīti na kintvāvṛtamasti tatpunarīśvaraprasādākasyacidvyajyata ityāha-na nāstīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1118_1: vā tṛtīyaṃ viśvaiśvaryamaṇimādirūpaṃ martyadehapāte sati siddhe dehe bhavati tadabhogānantaramātmajñānātkevalo
GSP33brssgo3u:1128: asti cātropamā yathāgnerdahanaprakāśanasaṃpannasyāpyaraṇitasya dahanaprakāśane tirohite bhavato yathā vā bhasmacchannasya /
GSP33brssgo3u:1131: nanvasya eva jīva īśvarādastu tiraskṛtajñānaiśvaryatvātkiṃ dehayogakalpanayā /
GSP33brssgo3u:1136: 'tatsatyaṃ sa ātmā tattvamasi śvetaketo' (chā. 6.9.4) iti ca jīvāyopadiśatīśvarātmatvam /
GSP33brssgo3u:1138: ataśca na sāṃkalpikī jīvasya svapne rathādisṛṣṭirghaṭate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1139: yadi ca sāṃkalpikī svapne rathādisṛṣṭiḥ syānnaivāniṣṭaṃ kaścitsvapnaṃ paśyet /
GSP33brssgo3u:1141: yatpunaruktaṃ jāgaritadeśaśrutiḥ svapnasya satyatvaṃ sthāpayatīti na tatsāmyavacanaṃ satyatvābhiprāyaṃ svayañjyotiṣṭvavirodhāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:1145: uktaiśvaryatirobhāve dehābhimāno heturiti kathanārthaṃ sūtraṃ, tannirasyāṃ śaṅkāmāha-kasmāditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:1155: tadabhāvo nāḍīṣu tacchruter ātmani ca | BBs_3,2.7 |
GSP33brssgo3u:1158: kvacicchrūyate- 'tadyatraitatsuptaḥ samastaḥ svapnaṃ na vijānātyāsu tadā nāḍīṣu sṛpo bhavati' (chā. 8.6.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1159: anyatra tu nāḍīrevānukramya śrūyate - 'tābhiḥ pratyavasṛpya purītati śete' (bṛ. 2.1.19) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1160: tathānyatra nāḍīrevānukramya 'tāsu tadā bhavati yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kañcana paśyatyathāsminprāṇa evaikadhā bhavati' (kauṣī. 4.19) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1162: tathānyatra 'satā somya tadā saṃpanno bhavati svamapīto bhavati' (chā. 6.8.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1163: 'prājñenātmanā saṃpariśvakto na bāhyaṃ kiñcana veda nāntaram' (bṛ. 4.3.21) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo3u:1164: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimetāni nāḍyādīni parasparanirapekṣāṇi bhinnāni suṣuptisthānānyāhosvitparasparāpekṣayaikaṃ suṣuptisthānamasti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1168: nāḍyādīnāṃ tvekārthatā suṣuptau dṛśyate - 'nāḍīśu sṛpto bhavati' (chā. 8.6.3) 'purītati śete'
GSP33brssgo3u:1169: (bṛ. 2.1.19) iti ca tatra tatra saptamīnirdeśasya tulyatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:1170: nanu naivaṃ sati saptamīnirdeśo dṛśyate - 'satā somya tadā saṃpanno bhavati' (chā. 6.8.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1173: vākyaśeṣo hi tatrāyatanaiṣī jīvaḥ sadupasarpatītyāha - 'anyatrāyatanamalabdhvā prāṇamevopaśrayate' (chā. 6.8.2)
GSP33brssgo3u:1174: iti prāṇaśabdena tatra prakṛtasya sata upādanāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:1176: saptamīnirdeśo 'pi tatra vākyaśeṣe dṛśyate - 'sati saṃpadya na viduḥ sati saṃpadyāmahe' (chā. 6.9.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1177: sarvatra ca viśeṣavijñānoparamalakṣaṇaṃ suṣuptaṃ na viśiṣyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1179: evaṃ prāpte pratipādyate - tadabhāvo nāḍīṣvātni ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1180: tadabhāva iti tasya prakṛtasya svapnadarśanasyābhāvaḥ suṣuptamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1181: nāḍīṣvātmani ceti samuccayenaitāni nāḍyādīni svāpāyopaiti na vikalpenetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1183: tathāhi - sarveṣāmeva nāḍyādīnāṃ tatra tatra suṣuptisthānatvaṃ śrūyate tacca masuccaye saṃgṛhītaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:1189: tathehāpi nāḍīṣu purītati brahmaṇi ca svapitītyetadupapadyate samuccayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1190: tathāca śrutiḥ - 'tāsu tadā bhavati yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kañcana paśyatyathāsminprāṇa evaikadhā bhavati' (kauṣī. 4.19)
GSP33brssgo3u:1191: iti samuccayaṃ nāḍīnāṃ prāṇasya ca suṣuptau śrāvayatyekavākyopādānāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:1193: yatrāpi nirapekṣā iva nāḍīḥ suptisthānatvena śrāvayati - 'āsu tadā nāḍīṣu sṛpto bhavati' (chā. 8.6.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1194: tatrāpi pradeśāntaraprasiddhasya brahmaṇo 'pratiṣedhānnāḍīdvāreṇaiva brahmaṇyevāvatiṣṭhata iti pratīyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1197: yo hi gaṅgayā sāgaraṃ gacchati gata eva sa gaṅgāyāṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:1202: bravīti ca pāpmasparśābhāve hetum - tejasā nāḍīgatena pittākhyenābhivyāptakaraṇo na bāhyānviṣayānīkṣata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1204: śrutyantare -' brahmaiva teja eva' (bṛ. 4.4.7) iti tejaḥ śabdasya brahmaṇi pratyuktatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:1205: brahmaṇā hi tadā saṃpanno bhavati nāḍīdvāreṇātastaṃ na kaścana pāpmāna spṛśatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1206: brahmasamapattiśca pāpmasparśābhāve hetuḥ samadhigataḥ - 'sarve pāpmāno 'ta nivartante 'pahatapāpmā hyeṣa brahmalokaḥ' (chā.
GSP33brssgo3u:1208: evañca sati pradeśāntaraprasiddhena brahmaṇā suṣuptisthānenānugato nāḍīnāṃ samuccayaḥ samadhigato bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:1209: tathā purītato 'pi brahmaprakriyāyāṃ saṃkīrtanāttadanuguṇameva suptisthānatvaṃ vijñāyate - 'ya eṣo 'ntarhṛdaya ākāśastasmiñchete' (bṛ. 2.1.17)
GSP33brssgo3u:1210: iti hṛdayākāśe suptisthāne prakṛta idamucyate 'purītati śete' (bṛ. 2.1.19) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1212: tadantarvartinyāpi hṛdayākāśe śayānaḥ śakyate purītati śeta iti vaktum /
GSP33brssgo3u:1213: prākāraparikṣipte 'pi pure vartamānaḥ prākāre vartata ityucyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1214: hṛdayākāśasya ca brahmatvaṃ samadhigatam - 'dahara uttarebhyaḥ' (bra.sū. 1.3.14) ityatra /
GSP33brssgo3u:1218: evametāsu śrutiṣu trīṇyeva suṣuptisthānāni saṃkīrtitāni nāḍyaḥ purītadbrahma ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1219: tatrāpi dvāramātraṃ nāḍyaḥ purītacca, brahmaiva tvekaṃ suṣupti sthānam /
GSP33brssgo3u:1220: apica nāḍyaḥ purītadvā jīvasyopādhyādhāra eva bhavati tatrāsya karaṇāni vartanta iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1223: brahmādhāratvamapyasya suṣupte naivādhārādheyabhedābhiprāyeṇocyate kathaṃ tarhi tādātmyābhiprāyeṇa /
GSP33brssgo3u:1224: yata āha - 'satā somya tadā saṃpanno bhavati svamapīto bhavati' (chā. 6.8.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1226: apica na kadācijjīvasya brahmaṇā saṃpattirnāsti svarūpasyānapāyitvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:1228: ataśca suptāvasthāyāṃ kadācitsatāṃ saṃpadyate kadācinna saṃpadyata ityayuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:1229: apica sthānavikalpābhyupagame 'pi viśeṣavijñānopalakṣaṇaṃ tāvatsuṣuptaṃ na kvacidviśiṣyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1232: nāḍīṣu puratīti ca śayānasya na kiñcidavijñāne kāraṇaṃ śakyaṃ vijñātuṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:1233: bhedaviṣayatvāt 'yatra vā anyadiva syāttatrānyo 'nyatpaśyet' (bṛ. 4.3.31) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1237: yathā viṣṇumitraḥ pravāsī svagṛhaṃ na paśyati /
GSP33brssgo3u:1239: upādhigatamevātidūrādikāraṇamavijñāna iti yadyucyeta tathāpyupādherupaśāntatvātsatyeva saṃpanno na vijānatīti yuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:1241: nahi nāḍyaḥ suptisthānaṃ purītadvetyanena vijñānena kiñcitprayojanamasti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1245: tena tu vijñānena prayojanamasti jīvasya brahmātmatvāvadhāraṇaṃ svapnajāgaritavyavahāravimuktatvāvadhāraṇaṃ ca /
GSP33brssgo3u:1249: yatra kāle suptaḥ suṣuptaḥ samasto nirastabāhyakaraṇo manolayātsamyakprasaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1254: siddhānte nāḍībhiḥ purītataṃ gatvāntarhṛdi brahmaṇyeva śeta iti samuccyāt tannirṇaya iti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1255: ekapuroḍāśārthatvaṃ vrīhiyavayordṛṣṭaṃ nāḍyādīnāmekasmin svāparūpārthe nirapekṣasthānatvaṃ tu kuta ityata āha-nāḍyādīnāṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1257: āyatanaśabdātsaptamyartha ādhāratvaṃ gamyata ityāha-naiṣa doṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1258: anyatrāvasthādvaye śrānto jīvo viśrāntisthānaṃ prāṇākhyaṃ sadbrahmopasarpati suṣuptāvityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1259: saptamīśrutyā nirapekṣādhāratvabhānādvikalpa āstheyaḥ kadācitsamuccityāpi nāḍyādīnāṃ sthānatvamiti na samuccayaśrutivirodha iti pūrvapakṣārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1262: yadā nāḍyaḥ suṣuptisthānaṃ tadā purītatsthānaṃ na bhavatīti śrutasthānatvasya pakṣe bādhaḥ syāt,
GSP33brssgo3u:1269: tathehāpi nāḍīpurītatorjīvasya saṃcāradvārā brahmaṇyeva suptiriti samuccaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1270: nāḍīnāṃ prāṇasya ca ekena vākyenopādānānmithaḥ samuccaya ityāha-ekavākyeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1271: ādhāratvamātraṃ saptamyartho na nirapekṣatvamato na samuccayasya saptamyā bādha ityāha-na caivamapīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1273: atra nāḍīśrutau nāḍīṣu bhoktuḥ suptirna vivakṣitā raśmisaṃbandhanāḍīrūpamārgastutyarthatvādityāha-apiceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1277: 'tāsu tadā bhavatyathāsmin prāṇa evaikadhā bhavati'iti śruteḥ samuccaya āśrito bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1279: ākāśe brahmaṇi śeta ityupakramya tābhiḥ pratyavasṛpya purītamiti śeta ityuktaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:1280: tathāca nāḍīdvārā purītataṃ gatvā brahmaṇi śeta iti samuccayaḥ siddha ityāha-tathā nāḍīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1281: satā saṃpanno bhavati prājñena saṃpariṣvakta iti satprājñayoḥ śruteḥ pañca suptisthānānītyata āha-satprājñayoriti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1283: nāḍyādīnāṃ tu brahmanirapekṣatayā suṣuptajīvādhāratvāsāmarthyānna vikalpa ityāha-apica nāḍya iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1287: nanu brahmāpi jīvasya na mukhyaṃ sthānaṃ abhedādityata āha-brahmādhāratvamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1288: jīvasya brahmaṇyabhedenāvasthānaṃ nāḍīpurītatostu līnopādherjīvasya sthitireva na saṃbhavatītyekārthasāmarthyābhāvānna vikalpa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1289: suṣuptau jīvasya bhedakopādhilayāccautsargikabrahmābhedasya vikalpo na yukta ityāha-apiceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1290: kiñca nāḍyādīnāmanyatamasthāne kvacitsuptivādināpi suṣuptaṃ na viśiṣyata iti vaktavyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:1291: tacca vaktuṃ na śakyata ityāha-apica sthāneti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1293: nāḍīpūritadratasya tu jīvasya bhedāvasthatvādbhedāvijñāne karaṇaṃ nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1298: upādhisaṃbhinnasyaiva nāḍyādau svāpe katipayasaṃnikṛṣṭārthajñānaprasaṅgāt suṣuptivyāghātaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:1299: upādhilaye tvanyatra jīvasya sthityayogādbrahmaṇyeva svāpa āstheya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1300: evaṃ vikalpaṃ nirasya nāḍīpurītatorbrahmaṇā saha tulyavatsamuccayamaphalatvena dūṣayan guṇapradhānatvena samuccayamupasaṃharati-naca vayamityādinā //7//
GSP33brssgo3u:1305: yasmāccātmaiva suptisthānamata eva ca kāraṇānnityavadevāsmādātmanaḥ prabodhaḥ svāpādhikāre śiṣyate - 'kuta etadāgāt' (bṛ. 2.1.16)
GSP33brssgo3u:1306: ityasya praśnasya prativacanāvasare 'yathāgneḥ kṣudrā visphuliṅgā vyuccārantyevamevaitasmādātmanaḥ sarve prāṇāḥ' (bṛ. 2.1.20) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:1307: 'sata āgamya na viduḥ sata āgacchāmahe' (chā. 6.10.2) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo3u:1308: vikalpyamāneṣu tu suṣuptisthāneṣu kadācinnāḍībhyaḥ pratibudhyate kadācitpurītataḥ kadācidātmana ityaśāsiṣyat /
GSP33brssgo3u:1310: kiñca brahmaṇaḥ sakāśājjīvasyotthānaśruterbrahmaiva suṣuptisthānamityāha-sūtrakāraḥ-ataḥ prabodha iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1312: tasmādupādhilaye jīvasya brahmābhedādaupādhika eva bheda iti vivekadvākyārthābhedasiddhiriti sthitam //8//
GSP33brssgo3u:1318: tasyāḥ punaḥ satsaṃpatteḥ pratibudhyamānaḥ kiṃ ya eva satasaṃpannaḥ sa eva pratibudhyata uta sa vānyo veti cintyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1320: kutaḥ - yadā hi jalarāśau kaścijjalabinduḥ prakṣipyate jalarāśireva sa tadā bhavati punaruddharaṇe ca sa eva jalabindurbhavatīti duḥsaṃpādam /
GSP33brssgo3u:1321: tadvatsuptaḥ pareṇaikatmāpannaḥ saṃprasīdatatīti na sa eva punarutthātumarhati /
GSP33brssgo3u:1322: tasmātsa eveśvaro vānyo vā jīvaḥ pratibudhyata ityevaṃ prāpta idamāha - sa eva tu jīvaḥ luptaḥ svāsthyaṃ gataḥ punaruttiṣṭhati nānyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1330: tasmādeka eva pūrvedyuraparedyuścaikasya karmaṇaḥ karteti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1331: itaśca sa evottiṣṭhati yatkāraṇamatīte 'hanyahamado 'drākṣamiti pūrvānubhūtasya paścātsmaraṇamanyasyotthāne nopapadyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1336: 'sarvāḥ prajā aharahargacchantya etaṃ brahmalokaṃ na vindanti' (chā. 8.3.2)
GSP33brssgo3u:1337: 'ta iha vyāghro vā siṃho vā vṛko vā varāho vā kīṭo vā pataṅgo vā daṃśo vā maśako vā yadyadbhavanti tadābhavanti'
GSP33brssgo3u:1338: (chā. 6.9.3) ityevamādayaḥ śabdāḥ svāpaprabodhādhikāre paṭhitā nātmāntarotthāne sāmañjasyamīyuḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1342: evaṃ cetsyādvada kiṃ kālāntaraphalena karmaṇā vidyayā vā kṛtaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:1343: apicānyotthānapakṣe yadi tāvaccharīrāntare vyavaharaṇamāṇo jīva uttiṣṭhettatratyavyavahāralopaprasaṅgaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:1345: yohi yasmiñśarīre suptaḥ sa tasminnotiṣṭhatyanyasmiñśarīre supto 'nyasminnuttiṣṭhatīti ko 'syāṃ kalpanāyāṃ lābhaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:1352: yatpunaruktaṃ yathā jalarāśau prakṣipto jalabindurnoddhartuṃ śakyata evaṃ sati saṃpanno jīvo notpatpatitumarhatīti, tatparihriyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1354: iha tu vidyate vivekakāraṇaṃ karma cāvidyā ceti vaiṣamyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:1355: dṛśyate ca durvivecayorapyasmajjātīyaiḥ kṣīrodakayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭayorhaṃsena vivecanam /
GSP33brssgo3u:1356: apica na jīvo nāma kaścitparasmādanyo vidyate yo jalabinduriva jalarāśeḥ sato vivicyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:1360: sa evāyamupādhiḥ svāpaprabodhayorbījāṅ kuranyāyenetyataḥ sa eva jīvaḥ pratibudhyata iti yuktam // 9 //
GSP33brssgo3u:1362: suṣuptau upādhināśāt karmānusmṛtyāderdarśanācca saṃśaye satyasmādbrahmaṇo jīvasyotthānaśruterbrahmaiva suṣuptisthānamityuktamayuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:1363: suptādanyasyāpyutthānasaṃbhavena suṣuptasya nāḍyādisthānatvasaṃbhavādityākṣepasaṃgatyā niyamakābhāvādaniyama iti pūrvapakṣamāha-tasyāḥ punarityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:1365: siddhānte tu ajñātabrahmātmanā sthitasyājñānabalena punastasyaivotthānāvaśyaṃbhāvādajñānanāśāya jñānāpekṣeti phalam /
GSP33brssgo3u:1368_0: jñānaṃ vinā buddhyādyupādheratyantanāśābhāvādyayā buddhyopahito jīvaḥ suṣuptau kāraṇātmanā
GSP33brssgo3u:1368_1: sthitastasyaiva nānākarmānubhavasaṃskāravatyopahita uttiṣṭhatīti siddhāntayati-sa eva tvityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:1373: pratiniyataṃ gamanaṃ yathā bhavati tathā pratiyonyāgacchati jāgaraṇāyeti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1375: iha pūrvaprabodhe ye bhavanti ta eva tadottaraprabodhe bhavantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1377: sa evottiṣṭhatīti niścīyate ityarthaḥ atraivotsūtraṃ yuktyantaramāha-apicetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:1380: asmadādyaśakyamapi vivecanaṃ prāṇyadṛṣṭāpekṣa īśvaraḥ karotīti matvā dṛṣṭāntamāha-dṛśyate ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1382: abhede sa vānyo vottiṣṭhati iti cintānavakāśa ityāśaṅkya buddhibhedena jīvabhedāccintetyāha-evaṃ satīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1383: suṣuptau buddhināśena pratyahaṃ buddhyupādhibhedādekajīvasya vyavahāro na syādityata āha-sa evāyamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1390: asti mugdho nāma yaṃ mūrchita iti laukikāḥ kathayanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1392: tisrastāvadavasthāḥ śarīrasthasya jīvasya prasiddhā jāgaritaṃ svapnaḥ suṣuptiriti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1394: natu pañcamīkācidavasthā jīvasya śrutau smṛtau vā prasiddhāsti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1395: tasmāccatasṛṇāmevāvasthānāmanyatamāvasthā mūrchetyevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ- na tāvanmugdho jāgaritāvastho bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo3u:1399: yatheṣukāro jāgradapīṣvāsaktamanastayā nānyānviṣayānīkṣata evaṃ mugdho musalasaṃpātādijanitaduḥkhānubhavavyagramanastayā jāgradapi nānyānviṣayānīkṣata iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1403: mugdhastu labdhasaṃjño bravītyandhe tamasyahametāvantaṃ kālaṃ prakṣipto 'bhūvaṃ na kiñcinmayā cetitamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1408: mugdhe hi jantau mṛto 'yaṃ syānna vā mṛta iti saṃśayānā ūṣmāsti nāstīti hṛdayadeśamālabhante niścayārthaṃ prāṇo 'sti nāstīti ca nāsikādeśam /
GSP33brssgo3u:1409: yadi prāṇoṣmaṇorastitvaṃ nāvagacchanti tato mṛto 'yamityadhyavasāya dahanāyāraṇyaṃ nayanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1410: atha tu prāṇamūṣmāṇaṃ vā pratipadyante tato nāyaṃ mṛta ityadhyavasāya saṃjñālābhāya bhiṣajyanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1416: mugdhaḥ kadācicciramapi nocchvasiti savepathurasya deho bhavati bhayānakaṃ ca vadanaṃ visphārite netre /
GSP33brssgo3u:1417: suṣuptastu prasannavadanastulyakālaṃ punaḥ punarucchvasiti nimīlite asya netre bhavataḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1419: pāṇipeṣaṇamātreṇa ca suṣuptamutthāpayanti natu mugdhaṃ mudgaraghātenāpi /
GSP33brssgo3u:1426: yāvatā suptaṃ prati tāvaduktaṃ śrutyā - 'satā somya tadā saṃpanno bhavati' (chā. 6.8.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:1428: 'naitaṃ setumahorātre tarato na jarā na mṛtyurna śoko na sukṛtaṃ na dṛṣkṛtam' (chā. 8.4.1) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:1429: jīve hi sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ prāptiḥ sukhitvaduḥkhitvapratyayotpādanena bhavati /

GSP33brssgo3u:1432: atrocyate - na brūmo mugdher'dhasaṃpattirjīvasya brahmaṇā bhavatīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1433: kiṃ tarhyardhena suṣuptapakṣasya bhavati mugdhatvamardhenāvasthāntarapakṣasyeti brūmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1436: yadāsya sāvaśeṣaṃ karma bhavati tadā vāṅmanase pratyāgacchataḥ /

GSP33brssgo3u:1447: pūrvapakṣe prasiddhāvasthātaḥ pṛthagātmano mūrcchāto vivekārthaṃ yatnāsiddhiḥ phalaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:1448: siddhānte pṛthagyatnadhrauvyamiti bhedaḥ pariśeṣaṃ darśayan siddhāntayati-na tāvadityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:1450: aindriyakamarthajñānaṃ dehadhāraṇaṃ ca tasyāsti na mugdhasyeti vaiṣamyoktyā dūṣayati-netyādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:1457: uktasārūpyavairūpyābhyāmardhasaṃpattiḥ sarvaiḥ suṣuptidharmairasaṃpanno mugdhaḥ suṣupto na bhavati,
GSP33brssgo3u:1458: sarvairmaraṇāvasthādharmairasaṃpattermṛto 'pi na kintu avasthāntaraṃ gata iti sūtrārthaḥ /

GSP33brssgo3u:1461: upādhyabhāvaśca mugdhasyāpi mama iti yatastasmāt kṛtsnasaṃpattirevetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1464: mugdhatvaṃ hi suṣuptasyārdhena niḥsaṃjñatvādidharmeṇa sāmyena saṃpannaṃ bhavati,
GSP33brssgo3u:1475: na sthānato 'pi parasyobhayaliṅgaṃ sarvatra hi | BBs_3,2.11 |

GSP33brssgo3u:1477: santyubhayaliṅgāḥ śrutayo brahmaviṣayāḥ 'sarvakarmā sarvakāmaḥ sarvagandhaḥ sarvarasaḥ' (chā. 3.14.2)
GSP33brssgo3u:1481: yadāpyanyataraliṅgaṃ tadāpi kiṃ saviśeṣamuta nirviśeṣamiti mīmāṃsyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1482: tatrobhayaliṅgaśrutyanugrahādubhayaliṅgameva brahmetyevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - na tāvatsvata eva parasya brahmaṇa ubhayaliṅgatvamupapadyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1483: nahyekaṃ vastu svata eva rūpādiviśeṣopetaṃ tadviparītaṃ cetyādhārayituṃ śakyaṃ virodhāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:1489: ataścānyataraliṅgaparigrahe 'pi samastaviśeṣarahitaṃ nirvikalpameva brahma pratipattavyaṃ na tadviparītam /
GSP33brssgo3u:1494: sarvābhiravasthābhiraliptastvamartha iti nirūpayitukāmaḥ prathamaṃ tasya nirviśeṣatvamāha-na sthānato 'pi parasyobhyaliṅgaṃ sarvatra hi /
GSP33brssgo3u:1496: nirviśeṣatvaṃsav iśeṣatvaṃ cetyubhayaṃ liṅgyate jñāpyate yābhistā ubhayaliṅgaḥ śrutayaḥ saṃśayabījatvena santītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1497: yathā viruddhasuṣuptimaraṇobhayarūpaṃ mugdhatvaṃ tathā śrutiprāmāṇyādubhayarūpaṃ brahma dhyeyamiti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣaḥ /

GSP33brssgo3u:1505: upādheḥ satyatve 'pi tatkṛtaṃ mithyeti dṛṣṭaṃ brahmaṇi tūpādhīnāṃ mithyātvāttatkṛto viśeṣo mithyeti kimu vācyamityāha-upādhīnāmiti /

GSP33brssgo3u:1523: anyathā hi nirviṣayameva bhedaśāstraṃ prasajyeteti cet /

GSP33brssgo3u:1608: 'yato vāco nivartante aprāpya manasā saha' (tai. 2.4.1) ityevamādyā /

GSP33brssgo3u:1609_1: bho iti sa tūṣṇīṃ babhūva taṃ ha dvitīye vā tṛtīye vā vacana uvāca brūmaḥ khalu tvaṃ tu na vijānāsi /
GSP33brssgo3u:1613: tathā viśvarūpadharo nārāyaṇo nāradamuvāceti smaryate - 'māyā hyeṣā mayā sṛṣṭā yanmāṃ paśyasi nārada /

GSP33brssgo3u:1622: atastasya tūṣṇīṃbhāva evottaramiti sautraśca atośabdastathārthakaḥ ādimatkāryaṃ tanna bhavatītyanādimat /
GSP33brssgo3u:1625: sarvabhūtaguṇairdivyagandhādibhiryuktaṃ māṃ mūrtimantaṃ paśyasīti yatsā māyā,

GSP33brssgo3u:2271: svarūpeṇa brahmaṇā jīvasya saṃbandho bhedanivṛttirūpo yujyate na mukhyaḥ saṃyogādiḥ vastudvayāsattvāt tathā bhedo 'pi na svata ekatvaśruterityarthaḥ //36//
GSP33brssgo3u:2278: setvādivyapadeśeṣu hi mukhyeṣvaṅgīkriyamāṇeṣu pariccheda ātmanaḥ prasajyeta setvādīnāmevātmakatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:2279: tathānyapratiṣedhe 'pyasati vastu vastvantarādvyāvartata iti pariccheda evātmanaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:2285: nanu dvitīyābhāve sarvagatatvaśrutivirodha ityata āha-anena sarvagatatvamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2286_2: iti bhāvaḥ adhiṣṭhānenādhyastaṃ jagadvyāptamadhyastatvāt rajjvā vyāptasarpavat, iti nyāyaḥ //37 //
GSP33brssgo3u:2293: yadtadiṣṭāniṣṭavyāmiśralakṣaṇaṃ karmaphalaṃ saṃsāragocaraṃ trividhaṃ prasiddhaṃ jantūnāṃ kimetatkarmaṇo bhavatyāhosvidīśvarāditi bhavati vicāraṇā /
GSP33brssgo3u:2296: sa hi sarvādhyakṣaḥ sṛṣṭisthitisaṃhārānvicitrānvidadhaddeśakālaviśeṣābhijñatvātkarmiṇāṃ karmānurūpaṃ phalaṃ saṃpādayatītyupapadyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2300: karma vinaśyatsvakālameva svānurūpaṃ phalaṃ janayitvā vinaśyati tatphalaṃ kālāntaritaṃ kartrā bhokṣyata iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2302: yatkālaṃ hi yatsukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vātmanā bhujyate tasyaiva loke phalatvaṃ prasiddham /
GSP33brssgo3u:2303: nahyasaṃbaddhasyātmanā sukhasya duḥkhasya vā phalatvaṃ pratiyanti laukikāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2313: FN: iṣṭaṃ svargaḥ, aniṣṭamavīcyādisthānayogyam , vyāmiśraṃ manuṣyabhogyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2316: nirviśeṣatvādanyaḥ svabhāvaḥ phalahetutvākhyaḥ iṣṭaṃ sukhaṃ devādīnāṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2319: saṃsāro janmamṛtipravāhaḥ gocaraḥ āśrayo yasya tatsaṃsāragocaram /
GSP33brssgo3u:2321: atra pūrvapakṣe phaladāturīśvarasya tatpadavācyasyāsiddherlakṣyāsiddhiḥ siddhānte tatsiddhiriti phalabhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2323_0: yadyapi sarvagatatvavatphaladātṛtvaṃ vyavahāradaśāyāṃ sidhyati yathāpi karmaṇa eva
GSP33brssgo3u:2325: yāgādikriyākhyaṃ karma tāvat kṣaṇikaṃ tatkiṃ svanāśāt phalaṃ janayatyuta phalamutpādya naśyati,
GSP33brssgo3u:2331: apūrvaṃ kiṃ svatantrameva phaladānāya pravartate, cetanādhiṣṭhitaṃ vā, nādya ityāha-tadapīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2342: na kevalamupapattereveśvaraṃ phalahetuṃ kalpayāmaḥ kiṃ tarhi śrutatvādapīśvarameva phalahetuṃ manyāmahe /
GSP33brssgo3u:2343: tathāca śrutirbhavati - 'sa vā eṣa mahānaja ātmānnādo vasudānaḥ' (bṛ. 4.4.24)
GSP33brssgo3u:2350: karmaṇo 'pūrvasya vā jaḍatvenopakaraṇamātratvātsvatantra īśvara eva phaladāteti siddhānto darśitaḥ //39//
GSP33brssgo3u:2357: śrūyate tāvadayamarthaḥ svargakāmo yajeta ityevamādiṣu vākyeṣu /
GSP33brssgo3u:2358: tatra ca vidhiśruterviṣayabhāvopagamādyāgaḥ svargasyotpādaka iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2359: anyathā hyananuṣṭhātṛko yāga āpadyeta tatrāsyopadeśavaiyarthyaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:2360: nanvanukṣaṇavināśinaḥ sarmaṇaḥ phalaṃ nopapadyata iti parityakto 'yaṃ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2363: śrutiścetpramāṇaṃ yathāyaṃ karmaphalasamabandhaḥ śruta upapadyate tathā kalpayitavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2364: nacānutpādya kimapyapūrvaṃ karma vinaśyatkālāntaritaṃ phalaṃ dātuṃ śaknoti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2365: ataḥ karmaṇo vā sūkṣmā kāciduttarāvasthā phalasya vā pūrvāvasthāpūrvaṃ nāmāstīti tarkyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2372: tasya liṅarthasya preraṇātmano yāgo viṣayastadbhāvāvagamādyāgaḥ svargasādhanamiti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2374: apūrvadvārā karmaṇaḥ phalamupapadyata ityuktvā siddhāntaṃ dūṣayati-īśvarastviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2375: īśvaraḥ kiṃ karmānapekṣaḥ phalaṃ dadāti tatsāpekṣo vā, ādya āha-avicitrasyetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:2376: dvitīye saṃveṣṭanasaṃskāramātrātkaṭādau veṣṭanavatkarmāpūrvādeva phalasiddheḥ kimīśvareṇeti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2377: atra vayaṃ vadāmaḥ-candanakaṇḍakādidṛṣṭasaṃpattyaiva sukhādisaṃbhave kṛtaṃ dharmādharmābhyāmiti śrutismṛtibalāttadapekṣāyāmīśvareṇa kimaparāddham /
GSP33brssgo3u:2387: darmādharmayorapi hi kārayitṛtveneśvaro heturvyapadiśyate phalasya ca dātṛtvena 'eṣa hyeṣa sādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamebhyo lokebhya unninīṣate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2388: eṣa u evāsādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamadho ninīṣate' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2389: smaryate cāyamartho bhagavadgītāsu - 'yo yo yāṃ yāṃ tanuṃ bhaktaḥ śraddhayārcitumicchati /
GSP33brssgo3u:2392: labhate ca tataḥ kāmānmayaiva vihitānhitān' (7.21) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2394: tadeva ceśvarasya phalahetutvaṃ yatsvakarmānurūpāḥ prajāḥ sṛjatīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2399: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GSP33brssgo3u:2414: idānīṃ tu prativedāntaṃ vijñānāni bhidyante na veti vicāryate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2415: nanu vijñeyaṃ brahma pūrvāparādibhedarahitamekarasaṃ saindhavaghanavadavadhāritaṃ tatra kuto vijñānabhedābhedacintāvatāraḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2416: nahi karmabahutvavadbrahmabahutvamapi vedānteṣu pratipipādayiṣitamiti śakyaṃ vaktum /
GSP33brssgo3u:2420: yadi punarekasminbrahmaṇi bahūni vijñānāni vedāntāntareṣu pratipipādayiṣitāni teṣāmekamabhrāntaṃ bhrāntānītarāṇītyanāśvāsaprasaṅgo vedānteṣu /
GSP33brssgo3u:2427: atra hi karmavadupāsanānāṃ bhedābhedau saṃbhavataḥ karmavadeva copāsanāni dṛṣṭaphalāni cocyante /
GSP33brssgo3u:2433: asti cātra vedāntāntaravihiteṣu vijñāneṣvanyadanyannāma taittirīyakaṃ vājasaneyakaṃ kauthumakaṃ śāṭyāyanakamityevamādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:2434: tathā rūpabhedo 'pi karmabhedasya pratipādakaḥ prasiddho 'vaiśvadevyāmikṣā vājibhyo vājina' mityevamādiṣu /
GSP33brssgo3u:2436: tadyathā - kecicchākhinaḥ pañcāgnividyāyāṃ ṣaṣṭhamaparamagnimāmananyatpare punaḥ pañcaiva paṭhanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2438: tathā dharmaviśeṣo 'pi karmabhedasya pratipādaka āśaṅkitaḥ kārīryādiṣu /
GSP33brssgo3u:2441: evaṃ punaruktyādayo 'pi bhedahetavo yathāsaṃbhavaṃ vedāntāntareṣu yojayitavyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2443: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - sarvavedāntapratyayāni vijñānāni tasmiṃstasminvedānte tāni tānyeva bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2447: yathaikasminnagnihotre śākhābhede 'pi puruṣaprayatnastādṛśa eva codyate juhuyāditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:2448: evam 'yo ha vai jyoṣṭhaṃ ca śreṣṭhaṃ ca veda' (bṛ.6.1.1, chā. 5.1.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:2449: iti vājasaneyināṃ chandogānāṃ ca tādṛśyeva codanā /
GSP33brssgo3u:2450: prayojanasaṃyogo 'pyaviśiṣṭa eva 'jyeṣṭhaśca śreṣṭhaśca svānāṃ bhavati'' (bṛ. 6.1.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2451: rūpamapyubhayatra tadeva vijñānasya yaduta jyeṣṭhaśreṣṭhādiguṇaviśeṣaṇānvitaṃ prāṇatattvam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2452: yathā ca dravyadevate yāgasya rūpamevaṃ vijñeyaṃ rūpaṃ vijñānasya tena hi tadrūpyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2456: ye tu nāmarūpādayo bhedahetvābhāsāste prathama eva kāṇḍe na nāmnā syādacodanābhidhānatvāt ityārabhya parihṛtāḥ // 1 //
GSP33brssgo3u:2458: FN: codyata iti codanā puruṣaprayatnaḥ sa hi puruṣavyāpāraḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2462: iha tatphalaṃ vākyārthajñānamānandādayaḥ pradhānasyeti sūtreṇāpunaruktāpekṣitatatpadadvācyārthopasaṃhāreṇa nirdhāryata iti phalaphalibhāvaḥ saṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2463: saguṇavākyārthavidyācintā tu tadvidyānāṃ cittaikāgryadvārā nirguṇajñānasādhanatvātkriyata iti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2466: vedyabhede vidyābhedacintā syāt brahmaṇastu vedyasyaikyānna cintāvasara ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2470: pūrvapakṣe jñānabhedaśaṅkānupapattimuktvā codanādyabhedājjñānābheda iti siddhānto 'pyayukta ityāha-nāpyasyeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2472: saguṇavidyāsveva bhedābhedacintā kriyate nirguṇavidyāyāṃ tvaikyaṃ siddhamiti vācyārtharūpaguṇopasaṃhāramātraṃ kriyate vākyārthanirṇayāyeti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2474: atra tu mithobhinnāstāḥ kiṃ pratiśākhaṃ bhidyānte na veti nāmādibhedāccodanādyaviśeṣācca saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2475: pūrvapakṣe vidyābhedādguṇānupasaṃhāraḥ siddhānte tvabhedādupasaṃhāra iti phalabhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2477_0: tatroktā hetavo nāmādayo vidyābhedārthamihocyante 'athaiṣa jyotirathaiṣa sarvajyotiretena
GSP33brssgo3u:2477_3: jyotiṣṭomātkarmāntaraṃ viśiṣṭadakṣiṇākaṃ vidhīyata iti nāmnaḥ karmabhedakatvamuktama /
GSP33brssgo3u:2481_0: 'tapte payasi dadhyānayati sā vaiśvadevyāmikṣā vājibhyo vājinam'ityatra vaiśvadevyāmikṣāyāge
GSP33brssgo3u:2484: tathā retonyūnā vāgādayaśchāndogye tatsahitā vājināmiti prāṇavidyābhedaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2485: kārīrivākyādhyayane taittirīyakāṇāṃ bhūmau bhojanaṃ dharmaviśeṣo nānyeṣāṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2488: naca tānyeva kārīryādīni karmāṇi dharmaviśeṣamapekṣante nāpekṣante ceti yuktaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2489: ato dharmaviśeṣācchākhāntare karmabhedaḥ śaṅkitastathātrāpi muṇḍakādhyayena keṣāñcideva śirasyaṅgārapātradhāraṇarūpaṃ vrataṃ nānyeṣāmiti vidyābhedaḥ syāt punaruktirabhyāsaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2490: yathā 'samidho yajati tanūnapātaṃ yajati'iti yajatyabhyāsātprayājānāṃ bheda uktastathā śākhāntare 'bhyāsādvidyābhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2495: ete nindāprayaścitte vedāntavidyāsu na vidyete iti nodāhriyete /
GSP33brssgo3u:2496_0: yathā sarvaśākhāvihitasya karmaṇo jñātuṃ kartuṃ cāśakterbhedastathā sarvavedāntādhyayanajñānādyaśaktestattadvedāntavidyābhedaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:2496_1: syāt tathā śākhānāṃ sarvāsāmekarūpā samāptirnocyate kintu kasyāścitkvacitkarmaṇi
GSP33brssgo3u:2498: anyārthadarśanamarthavādastadbhedātkarmabhedavadvidyābheda iti pūrvapakṣasūtroktā hetavo darśitāste kecitsiddhānte pūrvapakṣe cātropayuñjanta iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2500: tatra nāmadheyaṃ guṇo rūpamabhyāsaśceti trayaṃ vyākhyātaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2502: 'tisra āhutīrjuhoti'iti saṃkhyayā karmabhedavat 'vāyuprāṇau'iti dvitvasaṃkhyayā saṃvargavidyābhedaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:2503: nityāgnihotraprakaraṇātprakaraṇāntare kuṇḍapāyināmayane 'māsamagnihotraṃ juhvati'iti śrutamagnihotraṃ prakaraṇāntarasthatvātkarmāntaramiti siddhāntitam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2507: uktanāmādibhiragnihotrādikarmaṇāṃ pratiśākhaṃ bhede prāpte śākhāntarādhikaraṇasiddhāntasūtraṃ 'ekaṃ vā saṃyogarūpacodanākhyāviśeṣāt'iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2511: yathā jyeṣṭhatvādiguṇakaprāṇavidyā sarvaśākhāsvekā tathā pañcāgnividyāpyekā phalasaṃyogādyaviśeṣāt,
GSP33brssgo3u:2515: kutaḥ acodanābhidhānatvātkāṭhakādiśabdānāṃ granthanāmatayā karmavācitvābhāvādato bhinnanāmakaśākhāgranthabhede 'pi tādvihitaṃ karmaikameva,
GSP33brssgo3u:2517: dharmaviśeṣastvadhyayanāṅgaṃ na karmāṅgamato na karmabhedakaḥ śākhābhede punaruktirasiddhā,
GSP33brssgo3u:2520: evaṃ samāptivacanabhedo 'pyaprayojaka ityaivaṃ karmābhedapramāṇaprābalye bhedahetavaḥ parihṛtā ityarthaḥ //1//
GSP33brssgo3u:2525: bhedān neti cen naikasyām api | BBs_3,3.2 |
GSP33brssgo3u:2528: tathāhi vājasaneyinaḥ pañcāgnividyāṃ prastutyaḥ ṣṭhamaparamagnimāmananti - 'tasyāgnirevāgnirbhavati' (bṛ. 6.2.14) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:2529: chandogāstu taṃ nāmananti pañcasaṃkhyayaiva ca ta upasaṃharanti 'atha ha ya etānevaṃ pañcāgnīnveda' (chā. 5.10.10) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2530: yoṣāṃ ca sa guṇo 'sti yeṣāṃ ca nāsti kathamubhayeṣāmekā vidyopapadyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:2532: tathā prāṇasaṃvāde śreṣṭhādanyāṃścaturaḥ prāṇānvākcakṣuḥ śrotamanāṃsi chandogā āmananti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2533: vājasaneyinastu pañcamamapyāmananti 'reto vai prajāpatiḥ prajāyate ha prajayā paśubhirya evaṃ veda' (bṛ. 6.1.6) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2534: āvāpodvāpabhedācca vedyabhedo bhavati vedyabhedācca vidyābhedo dravyadevatābhedādiva yāgasyeti cet /
GSP33brssgo3u:2537: yadyapi ṣaṣṭhasyāgnerupasaṃhāro na saṃbhavati tathāpi dyuprabhṛtīnāṃ pañcānāmagnīnāmubhayatra pratyabhijñāyāmānatvānna vidyābhedo bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo3u:2539: paṭhyate 'pi ca ṣaṣṭho 'gniśchandogaiḥ - 'taṃ pretaṃ diṣṭamito 'gnaya evaṃ haranti'
GSP33brssgo3u:2541: vājasaneyinastu sāṃpādikeṣu pañcasvagniṣvanuvṛttāyāḥ samiddhūmādikalpanāyā nivṛttaye 'tasyāgnirevāgnirbhavati samitsamit' (bṛ. 6.2.14)
GSP33brssgo3u:2543: athāpyupāsanārtha eṣa vādastathāpi sa guṇaḥ śakyatechandogairapyupasaṃhartum /
GSP33brssgo3u:2545: sāṃpādikāgnyabhiprāyā hyeṣā pañcasaṃkhyā nityānuvādabhūtā na vidhisamavāyinītyadoṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2551: FN: ito 'smāllokān diṣṭaṃ lokāntaraṃ pretaṃ gataṃ jñātayo 'gnaye harantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2555: asya pṛthakśāstratvātkarmanyāyānāṃ mānasavidyāsu vinā sūtraṃ duryojatvācca punaruktigandho 'pi nāstīti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2556: nanu tasya mṛtasya dāhārthamagnirantyeṣṭigataḥ ṣaṣṭho yaḥ prasiddhavadvājibhiruktaḥ sa chāndogye upasaṃhārya iti na rūpabhedaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2558: astu prajananaguṇavato retaso vājināmāvāpaśchandogānāṃ ca tasyodvāpastataḥ kimityata āha-āvāpeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2559: chāndogye ṣaṣṭhāgnyabhāvamaṅgīkṛtyālparūpabhedo na vidyaikyavirodhīti pariharati-naiṣa ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:2561: ito 'smāllokādiṣṭaṃ lokāntaraṃ pretaṃ gataṃ jñātayo 'gnaye harantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2562: nanu chāndogye 'gnimātraṃ śrutaṃ vājibhistu samidādiviśeṣaḥ paṭhyate iti rūpabhedastadavasthaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2564: ṣaṣṭhāgnestadviśeṣasya cānuvādamātratvenānupāsyatvātpañcāgnaya evopāsyā ubhayatreti na rūpabheda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2566: dyulokādīnāṃ pañcānāmanagnīnāmagnitvasaṃpattividhinaivārthātpañcatvaṃ saṃpattikalpitāgnīnāṃ siddhamanūdyate na dhyeyatvena vidhīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2567: chandogairvājiśākhāsthaṃ reta upasaṃhartavyamityuktvānupasaṃhāre 'pi na vidyābheda ityāha-na cāvāpeti //2//
GSP33brssgo3u:2571: svādhyāyasya tathātvena hi samācāre 'dhikārāc ca savavac ca tanniyamaḥ | BBs_3,3.3 |
GSP33brssgo3u:2572: yadapyuktamātharvaṇikānāṃ vidyāṃ prati śirovratādyapekṣaṇādanyeṣāṃ ca tadanapekṣaṇādvadyābheda iti tatpratyucyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2575: yatastathātvena svādyāyadharmatvena samācāre vedavratopadeśapare granta ātharvaṇikā idamapi vedavratatvena vyākyātamiti samāmananti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2577: iti cādikṛtaviṣayādecchabdādadhyayanaśabdācca svopaniṣadadhyayanadharma evaiṣa iti nirdāryate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2578: nanu ca 'teṣāmevaitāṃ brahmavidyāṃ vadeta śirovrataṃ vidhivadyaistu cīrṇam' (muṇḍa. 3.2.10)
GSP33brssgo3u:2579: iti brahmavidyāsaṃyogaśravaṇādekaiva sarvatra brahmavidyeti saṃkīryetaiṣa dharmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2582: praka-tatvaṃ ca brahmavidyāyā granthaviśeṣāpekṣamiti granthaviśeṣasaṃyogyevaiṣa dharmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2586: evaṃ rūpabhedo na vidyābhedaka ityuktvā dharmaviśeṣo 'pi na bhedaka ityāha-svādhyāyasyeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2587: godānavadadhyayanāṅgatvena śirovratamātharvaṇikānāṃ sūtre vihitaṃ na vidyāṅgamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2589: etatprakṛtaṃ muṇḍakamananuṣṭhitaśirovrato naro nādhīta iti śrutermuṇḍakādhyayanāṅgameva śirovratamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2590: nanu vidyāṅgatvenāpi idaṃ vrataṃ śrutamiti śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2591: sarvaśākhāsu brahmavidyaikaiva cedvidyāsaṃyuktaṃ vratamapi sarvatra saṃbadhyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:2594: tasya śirovratasya muṇḍakādhyayane niyama ityatra savavaditi nidarśananirdeśaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2596: atharvaṇaiḥ svasūtre udita eko 'gnirekarṣisaṃjñayā prasiddhastasminnagnau kāryā iti yathā niyamyante tathetyarthaḥ //3//
GSP33brssgo3u:2601: darśayati ca vedo 'pi vidyaikatvaṃ sarvavedānteṣu vedyaikatvopadeśāt sarve vedā yatparamāmananti (ka. 2.15) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2602: tathā etaṃ hyeva bahvṛcā mahatyukthe mīmāṃsanta etamagnāvadhvarya etaṃ mahāvrate chandogāḥ iti ca /
GSP33brssgo3u:2604: iti kāṭhaka uktasyeśvaraguṇasya bhayahetukasya taittirīyake bhedarśananindāyai parāmarśo dṛśyate 'yadā hyevaiṣa etasminnudaramantaraṃ kurute /
GSP33brssgo3u:2607: tathā vājasaneyake prādeśamātrasaṃpāditasya vaiśvānarasya chāndogye siddhavadupādānam 'yastvetamevaṃ prādeśamātramabhivimānamātmānaṃ vaiśvānaramupāste' (chā. 5.18.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2612: kiñca śākhāntaroktapādārthasya śākhāntare siddhavatparāmarśo vidyaikyaṃ darśayatītyāha-tathā mahadbhayamityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:2613: eṣa nara etasminnadvaye 'lpamapyantaraṃ bhedaṃ yadā paśyatyatha tadā tasya saṃsārabhayaṃ bhavatyeva,
GSP33brssgo3u:2614: yasmādviduṣo narasya bhedadarśinastadeva brahma bhayaṅkaraṃ bhavati,
GSP33brssgo3u:2617: kiñca sarveṣu vedānteṣūkthādīnāṃ pratīyamānatvena hetunaitadavagamyate-anyatroktānāṃ teṣāmanyatropāstyarthamupādānamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2626: sthite caivaṃ sarvavedāntapratyayatve sarvavijñānānāmanyatroditānāṃ vijñānaguṇānāmanyatrāpi samāne vijñāna upasaṃhāro bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:2628: ya eva hi teṣāṃ guṇānāmekatrārtho viśiṣṭavijñānopakārakaḥ sa evānyatrāpi /
GSP33brssgo3u:2632: yadi hi vijñānabhedo bhavettato vijñānāntaranibaddhatvādguṇānāṃ prakṛtivikṛtibhāvābhāvācca na syādupasaṃhāraḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2634: asyaiva tu prayojanasūtrasya prapañcaḥ sarvābhedādityārabhya bhaviṣyati // 5 //
GSP33brssgo3u:2636_0: śākhābhede samānavidyāyāṃ śrutā guṇā yathāśruti vyavasthitā uta ekatrāśrutā itaraśākhāta
GSP33brssgo3u:2636_1: upasaṃhartavyā iti saṃdehe vidyaikye 'pi tatra tatroktaireva guṇairvidyopakārasiddheḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:2644: nanvāgneyayāgāvaruddhānāṃ guṇānāṃ tato 'bhinne saurye prāptivadvidyāntarasthaguṇānāṃ vidyāntare prāptiḥ kiṃ syādityata āha-prakṛtīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2645: prakṛtiguṇānāṃ vikāre prāptiryuktā vidyānāṃ tu prakṛtivikṛtibhāvāsiddherna tatprāptirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2653: anyathātvaṃ śabdād iti cen nāviśeṣāt | BBs_3,3.6 |
GSP33brssgo3u:2657_0: iti prakramya vāgādīnprāṇānasurapāpmaviddhatvena ninditvā mukhyaprāṇaparigrahaḥ paṭhyate
GSP33brssgo3u:2657_1: - 'atha hemamāsanyaṃ prāṇamūcustvaṃ na udgāyeti tatheti tebhya eṣa prāṇa udagāyat' (bṛ. 1.3.7) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2659: iti prakramyetarānprāṇānasurapāpmaviddhatvena ninditvā tathaiva mukhyaprāṇaparigrahaḥ paṭhyate - 'atha ha ya evāyaṃ mukhyaḥ prāṇastamudgīthamupāsāṃcakrire' (chā. 1.2.7) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2664: anyathā hi prakramante vājasaneyino 'nyathā chandogāḥ 'tvaṃ na udgāya' (bṛ. 1.3.2)
GSP33brssgo3u:2672: vājasaneyake 'picodgīthasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ prāṇasya śrutam - 'eṣa u vā udgīthaḥ' (bṛ. 1.3.23) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2680_0: 'te ha devāḥ sāttvikavṛttayaḥ prāṇā anyonyamucūrhantedānīmasminyajñe udgīthenaudgātreṇa
GSP33brssgo3u:2680_1: karmaṇā rajastamovṛttirūpānasurānatītya devatvaṃ gacchāmaḥ'iti te caivaṃ nirdeṣamudgīthakartāramupāsyaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:2680_2: nirdhārayituṃ kṛtasaṃvādāḥ prathamaṃ vācyaṃ parīkṣitavantastvamaudgātraṃ no 'smākaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:2680_3: kurviti tayā tvanṛtaṃ kṛtaṃ tathā ghrāṇacakṣuḥśrotramanāṃsyapi kāmenāsurapāpmanā
GSP33brssgo3u:2680_4: grastānīti ninditvā āsanyamāsye bhavaṃ mukhamadhyasthaṃ prāṇamupāsyaṃ nirdhāritavanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2683: atra pūrvādhikaraṇasiddhāntanyāyenodgīthavidyeti saṃjñaikyena vidyaikyamiti pūrvapakṣe mitho guṇopasaṃhāraḥ phalaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2685: evaṃ yatra pūrvanyāyena pūrvapakṣaḥ tatrāpavādikī saṃgatiriti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2692: alparūpabhedo na vidyaikyavirodhītyuktanyāyena pūrvapakṣī pariharati-naiṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2694: yathāśmānaṃ prāpya loṣṭo vidhvaṃsate tathā prāṇaṃ hantumāgatā asurāstasya vīryeṇa svayameva dhvastā iti śrutamubhayatretyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2696: udgīthakartṛrūpatvena prāṇasyobhayatra śrutatvādekatra śrutaṃ kartṛtvamapyubhayatra draṣṭavyamityarthaḥ //6//
GSP33brssgo3u:2701: na vā vidyaikatvamātra nyāyyaṃ vidyābheda evātra nyāyyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2707: ityevamudgīthāvayavasyoṅkārasyopāsyatvaṃ prastutya rasatamādiguṇopavyākhyānaṃ tatra kṛtvā atha khalvetasyaivākṣarasyopavyākhyānaṃ bhavati (chā. 1.1.10)
GSP33brssgo3u:2708: iti punarapi tamevodgīthāvayavamoṅkāramanuvartya devāsurākhyāyikādvāreṇa tam prāṇamudgīthamupāsāṃcakrire (chā. 1.2.2) ityāha /
GSP33brssgo3u:2709: tatra yadyudgīthaśabdena sakalā bhaktirabhipreyeta tasyāśca kartodgātartviktata upakramaścoparapadhyeta lakṣaṇā ca psajyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:2713: tvaṃ na udgāya (bṛ. 1.3.2) ityapi tasyāḥ kartodgātartvikprāṇatvena nirūpyata iti prasthānāntaram /
GSP33brssgo3u:2714: yadapi tatrodgīthasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ prāṇasya tadapyudgātṛtvenaiva didarśayiṣitasya prāṇasya sarvātmatvapratipādanārthamiti na vidyaikatvamāvahati /
GSP33brssgo3u:2715: sakalabhaktiviṣaya eva ca tatrāpyudgīthaśabda iti vaiṣamyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2718: tathāca tatraiva śrāvitam- vācā ca hyeva sa prāṇena codagāyat (bṛ. 1.3.24) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2720_0: tathāhyabhyudayavākye paśukāmavākye ca tredhā taṇḍulānvibhajedye madhyamāḥ syustānagnaye
GSP33brssgo3u:2735: āptiḥ samṛddhiriti guṇānuktvā guṇavatyoṅkāre prāṇadṛṣṭividhānāyākhyāyikā prastutetyāha-rasatameti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2737: prāṇamudgīthamityatrāpyudgīthakartā prāṇa upāsya iti vyākhyāyatāmityata āha-tatra yadyudgītheti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2738: oṅkāropāstyupakramasaṅga udgīthapade kartṛlakṣaṇā ceti doṣadvayaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2739_0: nanu siddhānte 'pi tatpade 'vayavalakṣaṇā svīkāryā tato varaṃ kartṛlakṣaṇā śrutyantarānugrahāttathā
GSP33brssgo3u:2744: evaṃ chāndogye oṅkāra upāsya ukta itaratra tu prāṇa ityupāsyabhedādvidyābheda ityāha-vājeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2746: tatrodgītha upāsyatayā noktaḥ kintu prāṇasyopāsyasya guṇatayetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2749: sa udgātā vāgviśiṣṭaprāṇenaudgātraṃ kṛtavāniti śruterasaṃbhavo 'pi netyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2751: ekatrodgātā prāṇa upāsyo 'nyatroṅkāra ityantaraṅgopāsyarūpabhede spaṣṭe sati bahiraṅgārthavādasāmyamātreṇa nopāsanaikyaṃ yuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2753_0: 'vi vā etaṃ prajayā paśubhirardhayati vardhayatyasya bhrātṛvyaṃ yasya havirniruptaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:2753_1: purastāccandramā abhyudeti tredhā taṇḍulānvibhajedye madhyamāḥ syustānagnaye dātre
GSP33brssgo3u:2753_2: puroḍāśamaṣṭākapālaṃ kuryādye sthaviṣṭhāstānindrāya pradātre dadhaṃścaruṃ ye 'ṇiṣṭhāstānviṣṇave
GSP33brssgo3u:2754_2: candramāśca paścādabhyudeti tametaṃ yajamānaṃ kālavyatyayāparādhāttadeva niruptaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:2754_3: haviḥ prajādinārdhayati viyojayati śatruṃ cāsya vardhayati yasmātkālabhrāntimānyajamānaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2755_0: ye madhyamādibhāvena tredhā bhūtāstaṇḍulā dadhyādisahitā niruptāstānvibhajedagnyādibhyo
GSP33brssgo3u:2755_1: viyojayadviyojya ca dātṛtvādiguṇakānagnyādibhyo darśadevābhinnebhyo nirvapediti dadhan
GSP33brssgo3u:2756_0: atra kālāparādhe devāntarayuktaṃ prāyaścittarūpaṃ darśādbhinnaṃ karma vidhīyata iti
GSP33brssgo3u:2756_1: prāpte taṇḍulatredhātvādyanuvādena vibhajediti haviṣaḥ prakṛtadevaviyogena tasminneva
GSP33brssgo3u:2758_0: paśukāmavākye tu yadyapi ye sthaviṣṭhāstānagnaye sanimate 'ṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapedye
GSP33brssgo3u:2758_1: madhyamāstān viṣaṇave śipiviṣṭāya śṛte caruṃ ye kṣodiṣṭhāstānindrāya pradātre dadhaṃścarumiti
GSP33brssgo3u:2759_0: tathāpi yaḥ paśukāmaḥ syātso 'māvāsyāmiṣṭvā vatsānapākuryāditi nityaṃ darśakarma
GSP33brssgo3u:2759_2: nābhyudayavākyenārthaikyamiti tathā prakṛte 'pi nirdeśasāmyaṃ na vidyaikyaprayojakamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2762: para iti sakārāntaṃ parasmāt paraścāsau varācca varatara iti parovarīyānityekaṃ padam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2764: ākāśātmanā hiraṇyaśmaśrupuruṣātmanā codgīthopāstisāmye 'pi vidyābhedavadihāpi bheda ityarthaḥ //7//
GSP33brssgo3u:2768: saṃjñātaś cet tad uktam asti tu tad api | BBs_3,3.8 |
GSP33brssgo3u:2771: uktaṃ hyetat - 'na vā prakaraṇabhedātparovarīyastvādivat' (bra. sū. 3.3.7) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2772: tadeva cātra nyāyyataraṃ śrutyakṣarānugataṃ hi tatsaṃjñaikatvaṃ tu śrutyakṣarabāhyamudgīthaśabdamātraprayogāllaukikairvyahartṛbhirupacaryate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2774: tathā prasiddhabhedānāmapyagnihotradarśapūrṇamāsādīnāṃ kāṭhakaikagranthaparipaṭhitānāṃ kāṭhakasaṃjñakatvaṃ dṛśyate tathehāpi bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssgo3u:2775: yatra tu nāsti kaścidevañjātīyako bhedahetustatra bhavatu saṃjñaikatvādvidyaikatvaṃ yathā saṃvargavidyādiṣu // 8 //
GSP33brssgo3u:2781: asati bādhake saṃjñaikyamapi mānaṃ yathā saṃvargavidyeti saṃjñaikyātsarvaśākhāsu tadvidyaikyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2789: ityatrākṣarodgīthaśabdayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇye śrūyamāṇe 'dhyāsāpavādaikatvaviśeṣaṇapakṣāṇāṃ pratibhāsanātkatamo 'tra pakṣo nyāyyaḥ syāditi vicāraḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2792: yathā nāmni brahmabuddhāvadhyasyamānāyāmapyanuvartata eva nāmabuddhirna brahmabuddhyā nivartate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2795: apavādo nāma yatra kasmiṃścidvastuni pūrvaniviṣṭāyāṃ mithyābuddhau niścitāyāṃ paścādupajāyamānā yathārthā buddhiḥ pūrvaniviṣṭāyā mithyābuddhernivartikā bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:2803: viśeṣaṇaṃ punaḥ sarvavedavyāpina omityetasyākṣarasya grahaṇaprasaṅga audgātraviśeṣasya samarpaṇam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2806: evametasminsāmānādhikaraṇyavākye vimṛśyamāna ete pakṣāḥ pratibhānti tatrānyatamanirdhāraṇakāraṇābhāvādanirdāraṇaprāptāvidamucyate - vyāpteśca samañjasamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2808: tadiha kṣayaḥ pakṣāḥ sāvadyā iti paryudasyante /
GSP33brssgo3u:2810: tatrādhyāse tāvadyā buddhiritaratrādhyasyate tacchabdasya lakṣaṇāvṛttitvaṃ prasajyeta tatphalaṃ ca kalpyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:2811: śrūyata eva phalam 'āpayitā ha vai kāmānāṃ bhavati' (chā. 1.1.7) ityādīti cet /
GSP33brssgo3u:2822: nāpyekatvapakṣaḥ saṃgacchate niṣprayojanaṃ hi tadā śabdadvayoccāraṇaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:2824: naca hautraviṣaya ādhvaryavaviṣaye vākṣara oṅkāraśabdavācya udgīthaśabdaprasiddhirasti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2829: sarvavyāpyakṣaramiha mā prasañjītyata udgīthaśabdenākṣaraṃ viśeṣyate kathaṃ nāmodgīthāvayavabhūta oṅkāro gṛhyeteti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2834: adhyāsapakṣe hyarthāntarabuddhirarthāntare nikṣipyata iti viprakṛṣṭā lakṣaṇā viśeṣaṇapakṣe pravṛttāḥ śabdā avayaveṣvapi pravartamānā dṛṣṭāḥ paṭagrāmādiṣu /
GSP33brssgo3u:2843: pūrvamudgātṛkarmātmakodgīthāvayavatvamoṅkārasya dhyeyasya viśeṣaṇaṃ siddhavatkṛtya dhyeyabhedādvidyābhedaḥ siddhāntitaḥ sa na yukta ityākṣepasaṃgatyā pūrvapakṣayati-tatreti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2844: atra pūrvapakṣe pūrvoktasiddhāntāsiddhiḥ phalaṃ siddhānte tatsiddhiriti matvā siddhāntasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-caśabda ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:2846: yasyodgīthasya buddhiroṅkāre 'dhyasyate tadvācakodgīthaśabdasyoṅkāre lakṣaṇā syāttadbuddhiviṣayatvaguṇaparatvāttathā saṃbandho 'pyasiddhaḥ kalpanīyaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2847: pratīkopāsteḥ phalaṃ ca kalpyamiti gauravaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2850: 'oṅkāra āptiḥ samṛddhiriti' 'ya upāste sa kāmānāpnoti'iti śrutaṃ phalaṃ nādhyāsasyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2852: bhrāntiścet nivarteta na tu nivartata ityabhrantirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2853: kiñca tattvabodhakādvākyādbhrāntyapavādo bhavati nedaṃ vākyaṃ tattvaparamityāha-naceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2857: 'omityakṣaramupāsīta'ityukte sarvavedavyāpyoṅkāra ihopāstau prasajyeta tannirāsārthamudgīthāvayavatvaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ samañjasamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2858: adhyāsapakṣe tadbuddhiviṣayatvaguṇayogarūpaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kalpya iti viprakṛṣṭā lakṣaṇā avayavalakṣaṇā tu saṃnikṛṣṭā avayavāvayavisaṃbandhasya kḷptatvāt,
GSP33brssgo3u:2859: paṭāvayave dagdhe paṭo dagdha iti loke prayogācca /
GSP33brssgo3u:2860: nāmādau brahmaśabdasya tvagatyā brahmabuddhigrāhyatvaguṇalakṣaṇāśritā tatra pratīkopāstervivakṣitatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:2861_0: iha tu pratīkopāstividhikalpane āptyādiguṇakoṅkāre prāṇadṛṣṭividhāne ca vākyabhedaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:2867: vājināṃ chandogānāṃ ca prāṇasaṃvāde śraiṣṭhyaguṇānvitasya prāṇasyopāsyatvamuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2868: vāgādayo 'pi hi tatra vasiṣṭhatvādiguṇānvitā uktāḥ te ca prāṇe punaḥ pratyarpitāḥ - 'yadvā ahaṃ vasiṣṭho 'smi tvaṃ tadvasiśṣo 'si' (bṛ. 6.1.14) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:2869: anyeṣāmapi tu śākhināṃ kauṣītaki prabhṛtīnāṃ prāṇasaṃvādeṣu athāto niḥśreyasādānam 'etā ha vai devatā ahaṃśreyase vivadamānāḥ' (kau. 2.14)
GSP33brssgo3u:2870: ityevañjātīyakeṣu prāṇasya śraiḥṣṭamuktaṃ na tvime vasiṣṭhatvādayo 'pi guṇā uktāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2871: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimime vasiṣṭhatvādayo guṇāḥ kvaciduktā anyatrāpyasyerannuta nāsyeranniti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2874: 'atho ya evaṃ vidvānprāṇe niḥśreyasaṃ viditvā' iti tatratatraivaṃśabdena vedyaṃ vastu nivedyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2875: evaṃśabdaśca saṃnihitāvalambano na śākhāntaraparipaṭhimevañjātīyakaṃ guṇajātaṃ śaknoti nivedayitum /
GSP33brssgo3u:2877: evaṃ prāpte pratyāha - asyetanniyame guṇāḥ kvaciduktā vasiṣṭhatvādayo 'nyatrāpi /
GSP33brssgo3u:2881: abhede ca vijñānasya kathamime guṇāḥ kvaciduktā anyatra nāsyeran /
GSP33brssgo3u:2882: nanvevaṃśabdastatra tatra bhedenaivañjātīyakaṃ guṇajātaṃ vedyatvāya samarpayatītyuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2883_1: tasminneva vijñāne vājasaneyibrāhmaṇagatenaivaṃśabdena tatsaṃśabditamiti na paraśākhāgatamapyabhinnavijñānāvaruddhaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:2885: ekasyāmapi hi śākhāyāṃ śrutā guṇāḥ śrutā eva sarvatra bhavanti guṇavato bhedābhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:2886: nahi devadattaḥ śauryādiguṇatvena svadeśe prasiddho deśāntaraṃ gatastaddeśyairavibhāvitaśauryādiguṇo 'pyatadguṇo bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:2899: te ca guṇāḥ prāṇasya śraiṣṭhyaṃ niścitya vāgādibhistasminnarpitā iti śākhādvayasaṃmator'thaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2906: yathā vāgādibhyaḥ prāṇaśraiṣṭhyaṃ siddhamatho tathā ya evaṃ śraiṣṭhyaguṇaṃ vidvānupāste sa prāṇe śraiṣṭhyaṃ viditvā śreṣṭho bhavatīti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2907: evaṃ jātīyakavidyaikyātprāptamārthikaṃ vasiṣṭhatvādiguṇajātamevaṃśabdo na gṛhṇāti śrutāvalambitvāditi prāpte siddhāntayati-asyeranniti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2908: vājasaneyibrāhmaṇe tāvadevaṃśabdena vasiṣṭhatvādiguṇajātasya prāṇavidyāsaṃbandhaḥ siddhaḥ saiva vidyā kauṣītakiśrutau pratyabhijñāyate,
GSP33brssgo3u:2915: aparigaṇitā api guṇāḥ śrutā evetyatra dṛṣṭāntamāha-nahīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2922: brahmasvarūpapratipādanaparāsu śrutiṣvānandarūpatvaṃ vijñānaghanatvaṃ sarvagatatvaṃ sarvātmatvamityevañjātīyakā brahmaṇo dharmāḥ kvacitkecicchrūyante /
GSP33brssgo3u:2923: teṣu saṃśayaḥ - kimānandādayo brahmadharmā yatra yāvantaḥ śrūyante tāvanta eva tatra pratipattavyāḥ kiṃvā sarve sarvatreti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2924: tatra yathāśrutivibhāgaṃ dharmapratipattau prāptāyāmidamucyate - ānandādayaḥ pradhānasya brahmaṇo dharmāḥ sarve sarvatra pratipattavyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2927: sarvatra hi tadevaikaṃ pradhānaṃ viśeṣyaṃ brahma na bhidyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2929: nanvevaṃ sati priyaśirastvādayo 'pi dharmāḥ sarvatra saṃkīryeran /
GSP33brssgo3u:2930: tathāhi - taittirīyaka ānandamayamātmānaṃ prakramyāmnāyate - 'tasya priyameva śiraḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2939: brahmaṇastu nirviśeṣatvātsvaśākhāgatapadaireva pramitisiddhervyarthaḥ padāntaropasaṃhāra iti pratyudāharaṇena pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2942: tāni ca samānādhikaraṇāni padāni viruddhadharmatyāgena sarvādhiṣṭhānabhūtāmekāmakhaṇḍavyaktiṃ kṣayanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2943: na caikenaiva padena lakṣyasiddheḥ padāntaraṃ vyarthamiti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2945: yadyapi padadvaye 'pi lakṣaṇāvatarati tathāpyānando brahmetyukte duḥkhatvālpatvabhrantinirāse 'pyasattvajaḍatvādibhramo bhavedatastannirāsārthaṃ satyajñānādipadāni prayoktavyāni /
GSP33brssgo3u:2948: tacca viśeṣadarśanaṃ yāvadbhiḥ padairbhavati tāvanti padānyupasaṃhartavyānīti bhāvaḥ //11//
GSP33brssgo3u:2954: priyaśirastvādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ taittirīyaka āmnātānāṃ nāstyanyatra prāptiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2955: yatkāraṇaṃ priyaṃ modaḥ pramoda ānanda ityete parasparāpekṣayā bhoktrantarāpekṣayā copacitāpacitarūpā upalabhyante /
GSP33brssgo3u:2960: apica parasminbrahmaṇi cittāvatāropāyamātratvenaite parikalpyante na draṣṭavyatvena /
GSP33brssgo3u:2963: sa ca nyāyo 'nyeṣu niściteṣu brahmadharmeṣūpāsanāyopadiśyamāneṣu netavyaḥ saṃyadvāmādiṣu satyakāmādiṣu ca /
GSP33brssgo3u:2964: teṣu hi satyapyupāsyasya brahmaṇa ekatme prakramabhedādupāsanābhede sati nānyonyadharmāṇāmanyonyatra prāptiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2965: yathā ca dve nāryāvekaṃ nṛpatimupāsate chatreṇaikā cāmareṇānyā tatropāsyaikatve 'pyupāsanābhedo dharmavyavasthā ca bhavetyevamihāpīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2966: upacitāpacitaguṇatvaṃ hi sati bhedavyavahāre saguṇe brahmaṇyupapadyate na nirguṇe parasminbrahmaṇi /
GSP33brssgo3u:2967: ato na satyakāmatvādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kvacicchrutānāṃ sarvatra prāptirityarthaḥ // 12 //
GSP33brssgo3u:2968: brahmaikyāccedānandatvādidharmāṇāṃ sarvatra prāptistarhi saguṇabrahmavidyāgatadharmaprāptirapi syāditi śaṅkānirāsārthaṃ sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-priyeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2969_0: putradarśanasukhaṃ priyaṃ tadvārtādinā modastasya vidyādyatiśaye pramoda ityevaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:2969_1: tāratamyavanto dharmāstvadvaye jñeye na prāpnuvanti teṣāmabrahmasvarūpāṇāṃ brahmajñānānupayogāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2970: teṣāṃ brahma dharmatvaṃ cāsiddhamityāha-na caita iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2982_1: brahmaṇo dharmiṇa ekatvātsarve sarvatra pratīyeranniti vaiṣamyaṃ pratipattimātraprayojanā hi ta iti // 13 //
GSP33brssgo3u:2990: kāṭhake hi paṭhyate - 'indriyebhyaḥ parā hyarthā arthebhyaśca paraṃ manaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2992: ityārabhya 'puruṣānna paraṃ kiñcitsā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ' (ka. 3.11 ) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2993: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimime sarva evārthādayastatastataḥ paratvena pratipādyanta uta puruṣa evaibhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ paraḥ pratipādyata iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2994: tatra tāvatsarveṣāmevaiṣāṃ paratvena pratipādanamiti bhavati matiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2997: nanu bahuṣvartheṣu paratvena pratipipādayiṣiteṣu vākyabhedaḥ syāt /
