GSP33brssgo3u:4709: tadabhiprāyatāyāṃ hividyocita itīyatā svarūpasamakīrtanenaiva kṛtatvādanarthakamavadhāraṇaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brssgo3u:4712: tathā 'svapate jāgrate caivaṃvide sarvadā sarvāṇi bhūtānyetānyetānagniṃścinvanti' iti sātatyadarśanameṣāṃ svātantrye 'vakalpate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4713: yathā sāṃpādike vākyaprāṇamaye 'gnihotre 'prāṇaṃ tadā vāci juhoti - vācaṃ tadā prāṇe juhoti' (kau. 2.5)
GSP33brssgo3u:4714: iti coktvocyate - 'ete anante āhutī jāgracca svapaṃśca satataṃ - juhoti' (kauṣī. 2.5) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4716: kriyānupraveśe tu kriyāprayogasyālpakālatvena na sātatyeṣāṃ prayogaḥ kalpeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:4718: yatra hi vispaṣṭo vidhāyako liṅgādirupalabhyate yuktaṃ tatra saṃkīrtanamātrasyārthavādatvam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4719: iha hi vispaṣṭovidhyantarānupalabdheḥ saṃkīrtanādevaiṣāṃ vijñānavidhānaṃ kalpanīyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4720: tacca yathāsaṃkīrtanameva kalpayituṃ śakyata iti sātatyadarśanāttathābhūtameva kalpyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4722: etena tadyatkiñcemāni bhūtāni manasā saṃkalpayanti teṣāmeva sā kṛtiḥ ityādi vyākhyātam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4723: tathā vākyamapi evaṃvide iti puruṣaviśeṣasaṃbandhamevaiṣāmācakṣaṇaṃ na kratusaṃbandhaṃ mṛṣyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4733: sarvadā sarvabhūtāni madarthamagnīn cinvantīti dhyāyedityapūrvārthatayā vidhikalpanāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:4742_1: grahā agṛhyanta manasāstuvanmanasāśaṃsanyatkiñca yajñe karma kriyate yatkiñca yajñiyaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:4742_2: karma manasaiva teṣu tanmanomayeṣu manaścitsu manomayameva kriyate' ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:4744: naca pratyakṣāḥ kriyāvayavāḥ santaḥ saṃpadā lipsitavyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4746: nahyatra kriyāṅgaṃ kiñcidādāya tasminnado nāmādhyavasitavyamiti vadati /
GSP33brssgo3u:4747: ṣaṭtriṃśatsahasrāṇi tu manovṛttibhedānādāya teṣvagnitvaṃ grahādīṃśca kalpayati puruṣayādivat /
GSP33brssgo3u:4748: saṃkhyā ceyaṃ puruṣāyuṣasyāhaḥsu dṛṣṭā satī tatsaṃbandhinīṣu manovṛttiṣvāropyata iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4751: tathāhi - 'teṣāmekaika eva tāvānyānānasau pūrvaḥ' iti kriyāmayasyāgnermāhātmyaṃ jñānamayānāmekaikasyātidiśankiriyāyāmanādaraṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:4752: naca satyeva kriyāsaṃbandhe vikalpaḥ pūrveṇottareṣāmiti śakyaṃ vaktum /
GSP33brssgo3u:4753: nahi yena vyāpāreṇāhanīyadhāraṇādinā pūrvaḥ kriyāyāmupakaroti tenottara upakartuṃ śaknuvanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4754: yattu pūrvapakṣe 'pyatideśa upodbalaka ityuktaṃ sati hi sāmānye 'tideśaḥ pravartata iti tadasmātpakṣe 'gnitvasāmānyenātideśasaṃbhavātpratyuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4759: yathā prajñāntarāṇi śāṇḍilyavidyāprabhṛtīni svena svenānubadhyamānāni pṛthageva karmabhyaḥ prajñāntarebhyaśca svatantrāṇi bhavantyevamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4761: taduktaṃ prathame kāṇḍe - 'kratvarthāyāmiti cenna varṇatrayasaṃyogāt' (jai.sū. 11.4.7) iti // 50 //
GSP33brssgo3u:4764_0: saṃpadupāstyai manovṛttiṣu kriyāṅgānāṃ yojanamanubandhaḥ śrutyā kriyate tadanyathānupapattyāpyagnīnāṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:4765: te agnayaḥ, adhīyanta teṣāmādhānaṃ manasaiva kuryādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4772: kiṃ bahūktyā yatkiñcidyajñe karmārādupakārakaṃ yajñiyaṃ yajñasvarūpotpādakaṃ ca tatsarvaṃ manomayaṃ kuryāditi śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4776: anādarārtho 'tideśo na bhavati kintu vikalpārtha ityata āha-naceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4777: ekasminmādhye nirapekṣasādhanayorvikalpo bhavati yathā vrīhiyavayoratra tu kriyāgnerdhyānāgnīnāṃ sādhyabhedānna vikalpa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4783: artha iti śeṣaḥ manaścidādīnāṃ svātantraye kriyāprakaraṇādutkarṣaḥ syādityāśaṅkya sa iṣṭa ityāha-dṛṣṭaśceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4784: ekādaśe cintitaṃ 'rājā svārājyakāmo rājasūyena yajeta'iti prakṛtyāveṣṭirnāma kācidiṣṭirāmnātā-'āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo hiraṇyaṃ dakṣiṇā',
GSP33brssgo3u:4788: śrūyate-'yadi brāhmaṇo yajeta bārhaspatyaṃ madhye nidhāyāhutimāhutiṃ hutvābhighārayedyadi vaiśyo vaiśvadevaṃ caruṃ madhye nidadhyādyadi rājanyastadaindram'iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4790: tatrāgneyādicaruṣu aṅgānāṃ tantreṇa prayogo bhavati madhyenidhānaliṅgātprayogabhede madhye nidhānāyogādetayānnādyakāmaṃ yājayedityekavacanācca /
GSP33brssgo3u:4791: sa ca tantraprayogo rājasūyakratubāhyāyāmannādyakāmavarṇatrayakartṛkāyāmevāveṣṭau jñeyo na tu kratvantargatāyām /
GSP33brssgo3u:4792: nanu kimatra niyāmakaṃ kratvarthāyāmapyaveṣṭau tantraprayogaḥ kiṃ na syāditi cet /
GSP33brssgo3u:4794: varṇatrayasaṃyuktānāṃ kāmyāyāmevāṅgatantraikyasādhakasya madhye nadhānādiliṅgasya sattvādato liṅgaikavacanābhyāṃ tantraikye sati hiraṇyādikā militaikaivā dakṣiṇādheyā,
GSP33brssgo3u:4797: atra caikaprayogaliṅgasya kratvartheṣṭāvasaṃbhavaṃ kāmyeṣṭau ca saṃbhavaṃ vadatānena sūtreṇa kāmyeṣṭeḥ kratvartheṣṭivilakṣaṇatvātkratuprakaraṇādutkarṣa iti sūcitam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4811: yathā 'sa vā eṣa eva mṛtyurya eṣa etasminmaṇḍale puruṣaḥ' iti 'agnirvai mṛtyuḥ' (bṛ. 3.2.10)
GSP33brssgo3u:4813: yathā ca 'asau vāva loko gautamāgnistasyāditya eva samit' (chā. 5.4.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:4816: kratvarthatvapuruṣārthatvavaiṣamye 'pi mānasatvasāmānyaṃ na virudhyate viṣamayorapi sāmyadarśanādityarthaḥ //51//
GSP33brssgo3u:4820: pareṇa ca śabdasya tādvidhyaṃ bhūyastvāt tv anubandhaḥ | BBs_3,3.52 |
GSP33brssgo3u:4821: parastādapi 'ayaṃ vāva loka eṣo 'gniścittaḥ' ityasminnanantare brāhmaṇe tāvadvadhyaṃ kevalavidyāvidhitvaṃ śabdasya prayojanaṃ lakṣyate na śuddhakarmāṅgavidhitvam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4822: tatra hi -' vidyayā tadārohanti yatra kāmāḥ parāgatāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4823: na tatra dakṣīṇā yanti nāvidvāṃsastapasvinaḥ' ityanena ślokena kevalaṃ karmanindanvidhyāṃ ca praśaṃsannidaṃ gamayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:4824_0: tathā purastādapi yadetanmaṇḍalaṃ tapati ityasminbrāhmaṇe vidyāpradhānatvameva lakṣyate
GSP33brssgo3u:4824_1: so 'mṛto bhavati mṛtyurhyasyātmā bhavati iti vidyāphalenaivopasaṃhārānna karmapradhānatā
GSP33brssgo3u:4825: bhūyāṃsastvagnyavayavāḥ saṃpādayitavyā vidyāyāmityetasmātkāraṇādagninānubadhyate vidyā na karmāṅgatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:4827: kiñca pūrvottarabrāhmaṇayoḥ svatantravidyāvidhānāttanmadhyasthasyāpi brāhmaṇasya svatantravidyāvidhiparatvamityāha-pareṇa ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4828: cite 'gnau lokadṛṣṭividhānaṃ svatantramuttaratra gamyate pūrvatra maṇḍalapuruṣopāstistatsāṃnidhyānmadhye 'pi mānasāgnayaḥ svatantrā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4829: tarhi kriyāgninā saha pāṭhaḥ kimarthamityata āha-bhūyāṃsastviti //52//
GSP33brssgo3u:4836: nahyasati dehavyatiriktātmani paralokāścodanā upapajadyerankasya vā brahmātmatvamupadiśyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:4837: nanu śāstrapramukha eva prathame pāde śāstraphalopabhogyasya dehāvyatiriktasyātmano 'stitvamuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4839: iha tu svayameva sūtrakṛtā tadastitvamākṣepapuraḥsaraṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4840: ita eva cākṛṣyācāryeṇa śabarasvāminā pramāṇalakṣaṇe varṇitam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4841: ata eva ca bhagavatopavarṣeṇa prathame tantra ātmāstitvābhidhānaprasaktau śārīrake vakṣyamāḥ ityuddhāraḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4842: iha cedaṃ codanālakṣaṇeṣūpāsaneṣu vicāryamāṇeṣvātmāstitvaṃ vicāryate kṛtsnaśāstraśeṣatvapradarśanāya /
GSP33brssgo3u:4843_1: varṇitaṃ ko 'sau puruṣo yadarthā ete manaścidādaya ityasyāṃ prasaktāvidaṃ dehavyatiriktasyātmano 'stitvamucyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4845: ākṣepapūrvikā hi parihāroktirvivakṣiter'the sthūṇānikhanananyāyena dṛḍhāṃ buddhimutpādayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:4846_1: samastavyasteṣu bāhyeṣu pṛthivyādiṣvadṛṣṭamapi caitanyaṃ śarīrākārapariṇateṣu bhūteṣu
GSP33brssgo3u:4846_2: syāditi saṃbhāvayantastebhyaścaitanyaṃ madaśaktivadvijñānaṃ caitanyaviśiṣṭaḥ kāyaḥ puruṣa iti cāhuḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4847: na svargagamanāyāpavargagamanāya vā samartho dehavyatirikta ātmāsti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4849: yaddhi yasminsati bhavatyasati ca na bhavati tattaddharmatvenādhyavasīte yathāgnidharmāvauṣṇyaprakāśau /
GSP33brssgo3u:4850_1: upalabhyamānā bahiścānupalabhyamānā asiddhe dehavyatirikte dharmiṇi dehadharmā eva bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4854: manaścidādīnāṃ puruṣārthatvamuktaṃ tadayuktaṃ dehātiriktapuruṣābhāvādityākṣipati-eka ātmanaḥ śarīre bhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:4856: pūrvapakṣe tu paralokārthakarmasu mokṣārthavidyāyāṃ cāpravṛttiriti vyatirekamukhena phalamāha-na hyasatīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4857: vyatiriktātmavicārasya pūrvatantre kṛtatvātpaunaruktyamityāśaṅkya tatratyavicārasyāpīdameva sūtraṃ mūlaṃ jaiminisūtrābhāvādataḥ kva punaruktirityāha-nanu śāstretyādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:4858: 'yajñāyudhī yajamānaḥ svargaṃ lokameti'ityādivākyasya bhokturabhāvādaprāmāṇyaprāptāvita evākṛṣya bhokturvicāraḥ kṛta ityatra vṛttikāravacanaṃ liṅgamāha-ata eveti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4865: dehātirikta ātmāsti na veti vādivipratipatteḥ saṃśaye pūrvapakṣamāha-atraika iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4866_0: yadyapi samasteṣu militeṣu bhūteṣu caitanyaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ taptodakumbhasya jñānābhāvādvyasteṣu
GSP33brssgo3u:4866_1: tu nāstyeva tathāpi dehātmakabhūteṣu syāditi tebhyo bhūtebhyaścaitanyaṃ saṃbhāvayanto
GSP33brssgo3u:4867: yathā mādakadravyeṣu tāmbūlapatrādiṣu pratyekamadṛṣṭāpi madaśaktistatsaṃghātājjāyate tadvadityārthaḥ /

GSP33brssgo3u:5911: utpannā hi vidyā phalasiddhiṃ prati na kiñcidanyadapekṣata utpattiṃ prati tvapekṣate /
GSP33brssgo3u:5913: tathāhi śrutiḥ - 'tametaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena dānena tapasānāśakena' (bṛ. 4.4.22)
GSP33brssgo3u:5916: 'atha yadyajña ityācakṣate brahmacaryasya yajñādibhiḥ yaṃstavādyajñādīnāmapi hi sādhanabhāvaḥ sūcyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:5917: 'sarve vedā yatpadamāmananti tapāṃsi sarvāṇi ca yadvadanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5918: yadicchanto brahmacaryaṃ caranti tatte padaṃ saṃgraheṇa bravīmi' (kaṭha. 2.15)
GSP33brssgo3u:5920: smṛtirapi - 'kaṣāyapakatiḥ karmāṇi jñānaṃ tu paramā gatiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5921: kaṣāye karmabhiḥ pakke tato jñānaṃ pravartate' ityevamādyā /
GSP33brssgo3u:5923: yathāca yogyatāvaśenāśvo na lāṅgalākarṣaṇe yujyate rathacaryāyāṃ tu yujyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:5924: evamāśramakarmāṇi vidyayā phalasiddhau nāpekṣyanta utpattau cāpekṣyanta iti // 26 //
GSP33brssgo3u:5926: yathā pramāphalatvādavidyānivṛttau karmānapekṣā tathā pramātvādvidyāyāmapi pramākaraṇamātrasādhyāyāṃ nāsti karmāpekṣeti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5929: atra vividiṣāyāmiṣyamāṇajñāne vā yajñādīnāṃ karmaṇāṃ hetutvamapūrvatvādvidhīyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:5932: jvālādvārā pāraṃparye 'pi kāṣṭhaiḥ pacatīti prayogāt, dvārasyāvyavadhāyakatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:5935: kaṣāye karmabhiḥ pakve tato jñānaṃ pravartate'iti smṛteḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5936: 'avidyayā mṛtyuṃ tīrtvā vidyayāmṛtamaśnute'ityādiśrutyā karmaṇā pāpanivṛttau jñānena muktyabhidhānācceti siddhāntayati-idamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5937: nanvatra vividiṣantīti pañcamalakāreṇa vividiṣāṃ bhāvayeyuriti sanarthecchaiva bhāvyatayā bhāti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5938: tāṃ viṣayasaundaryalabhyatayollaṅghya vedanaṃ cedbhāvyamucyate tarhi vedanamapyullaṅghya tatphalaṃ mokṣa eva karmabhirbhāvyaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-vividiṣāsaṃyogācceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5939: iṣyamāṇatayā vidyāyāḥ śabdataḥ phalatvabhānādaśrutamokṣo na phalamanyathā kāṣṭhaiḥ pacatītyatrāpi kāṣṭhānāṃ pākaphalatṛptihetutvaprasaṅgāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5942: kaścittu jñānārthakarmadvāreti matvā sarve vedāntā ityuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:5947: śamadamādyupetas syāt tathāpi tu tadvidhes tadaṅgatayā teṣām apy avaśyānuṣṭheyatvāt | BBs_3,4.27 |
GSP33brssgo3u:5948: yadikaścinmanyeta yajñādīnāṃ vidyāsādhanabhāvo na nyāyyo vidhyabāvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:5949: 'yajñena vividiṣanti' ityevañjātīyakā hi śrutiranuvādasvarūpāvidyābhiṣṭavaparā na yajñādividhiparā /
GSP33brssgo3u:5950: itthaṃ mahābhāgā vidyā syādvidyārthī 'tasmādevaṃvicchanto dānta uparatastitikṣuḥ samāhito bhūtvātmaneyevātmānaṃ paśyati' (bṛ. 4.4.23)
GSP33brssgo3u:5952: nanvatrāpi śamādyupeto bhūtvā paśyatīti vartamānāpadeśa upalabhyate na vidhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5960: nahyayaṃ yajñādīnāṃ vividiṣāsaṃyogaḥ pūrvaṃ prāpto yenānūdyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:5961: 'tasmātpūṣā prapiṣṭabhāgo 'dantako hi ityevamādiṣu cāśrutavidhikeṣvapi vākyeṣvapūrvatvādvidhiṃ parikalpya pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ vikṛtau pratīyetyādivicāraḥ prathame tantre pravartitaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5963: smṛtirapi bhagavadgītādyāsvanabhisaṃdhāya phalamanutiṣṭhitāni yajñādīni mumukṣorjñānasādhanāni bhavantīti prapañcitam /
GSP33brssgo3u:5964: tasmādyajñādīni śamadamādīni ca yathāśramaṃ sarvāṇyevāśramakarmāṇi vidyotpattāvapekṣitavyāni /
GSP33brssgo3u:5970_0: śamāderāvaśyakatvānna śabdamātralabhyā vidyetyarthaḥ yasmādevaṃvinna lipyate karmaṇā
GSP33brssgo3u:5970_1: pāpakena tasmādeva vidyārthī śamādyupeto bhūtvā vicārayediti vidhirgamyata ityāha-neti brūma iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5971: atroparatapadena saṃnyāsa uktastasya śravaṇāṅgatvamate śamādiviśiṣṭaśravaṇamatra vidhīyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:5975_0: paśyediti ca prakṛtyā śravaṇalakṣaṇādoṣācca saṃnyāso na śravaṇasyāṅgaṃ kintu tataḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:5975_1: prāganuṣṭhoyatve 'pi śravaṇavajjñānārtha iti mataṃ tadā śamādisamuccayena jñānaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:5976: yaḥ pūrvaṃ yajñādiśruteḥ stutyarthatvāṅgīkāraḥ āpātato guḍajihvikānyāyena śamādisvīkārārthaṃ kṛtastamidānīṃ tyajati-yajñādīnyapīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5981: tatra pūṣā devatā piṣṭabhāgo vā darśapūrmamāsayornāsti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5982_2: pūṣoddeśena piṣṭabhāgaḥ kartavya iti vikṛtau saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5985: karmaṇāṃ jñānahetutve śamādivadyāvajjñānodayamanuvṛttiḥ syāttathāca saṃnyāsābhāva ityata āha-tatrāpīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5986: dṛṣṭavikṣepanivṛttidvārā śamādīnāṃ śānārthatvādanuvṛttirna karmaṇāmadṛṣṭadvārā jñānārthatvāditi bhāvaḥ //27//
GSP33brssgo3u:5991: sarvān nānumatiś ca prāṇātyaye taddarśanāt | BBs_3,4.28 |
GSP33brssgo3u:5992: prāṇasaṃvāde śrūyate chandogānām - 'na ha vā evaṃvidi kiñcanānannaṃ bhavati' (chā. 5.2.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5993: tathā vājasaneyinām - 'na ha vā asyānnaṃ jagdhaṃ bhavati nānannaṃ pratigṛhītam' (bṛ. 6.1.14) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5995: kimidaṃ sarvānnānujñānaṃ śamādivadvidyāṅgaṃ vidhīyata uta stutyarthaṃ saṃkārtyata iti saṃśaye vidhiriti tāvatprātm /
GSP33brssgo3u:5996: tathāhi - pravṛttiviśeṣakara upadeśo bhavatyataḥ prāṇavidyāsaṃnidhānāttadaṅgatveneyaṃ niyamanivṛttirupadiśyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:6002: ityanena vāmadevyāvidyāviṣayeṇa sarvastrayaparihāravacanena tatsāmānyaviṣayaṃ gamyāgamyavibhāgaśāstraṃ bādhyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:6004: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - nedaṃ sarvānnānujñānaṃ vidhīyata iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6005: nahyatra vidhāyakaḥ śabda upalabhyate 'na ha vā evaṃvidi kiñcanānannaṃ bhavati' (chā. 5.2.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:6008: apica śvādimaryādaṃ prāṇasyānnamityuktvedamucyate 'naivaṃvidaḥ kiñcidanannaṃ bhavati' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6013: etaduktaṃ bhavati- prāṇātyaya eva hi parasyāmāpadi sarvamannamadīyatvenābhyanujñāyate taddarśanāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:6014: tathāhi śrutiścākrāyaṇasyerṣeḥ kaṣṭāyāmavasthāyāmabhakṣyabhakṣaṇe pravṛttiṃ darśayati - 'maṭacīhateṣu kuruṣu' (chā. 1.10.1) ityasminbrāhmaṇe /
GSP33brssgo3u:6020: tadetaducchiṣṭaparyuṣitabhakṣaṇaṃ darśayantyāḥ śruterāśayātiśayo lakṣyate prāṇātyayaprasaṅge prāṇasaṃdhāraṇāyābhakṣyamapi bhakṣayitavyamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6029: atra bhakṣyābhakṣyaniyamatyāgasya vidyāṅgatvasiddhiḥ phalaṃ siddhānte tu vidyāstutiriti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6031: yathā grāmyakarmaṇi vāmadevyasāmopāsakavyatiriktaviṣayaṃ parastrīniṣedhaśāstraṃ tadvaditi prāpte siddhāntaṃ sūtrādbahireva darśayati-nedamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6032: prāṇavidyāvidhisaṃnidheraśakyatvācca stutireva na vidhiḥ kalpyaḥ niṣedhaśāstravirodhāt kḷpto hi vidhiḥ sāmānyaśāstrabādhako natu kalpya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6033: svasthasya prāṇavido na sarvānnānumatirityatra liṅgaṃ vadan sūtraṃ yojayati-taddarśayatīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6034_0: maṭacyo raktakṣudrapakṣiṇastairhateṣu kurudeśasthasasyeṣu durbhikṣe jāte bālayā saha
GSP33brssgo3u:6034_1: jāyayā munirdeśāntaraṃ gacchannibhyāgrāme sthitavānibhyo hastipālakastena sāmikhāditānardhabhakṣitān
GSP33brssgo3u:6035: ibhvena jalaṃ gṛhāṇetyukte satyucchiṣṭaṃ vai me pītaṃ syāditi pratiṣidhya māṣāḥ kiṃ nocchiṣṭā itībhyenokte sati māṣabhakṣaṇe jalatyāge ca kāraṇamuvāca /
GSP33brssgo3u:6037: jalapānaṃ tu svecchātastaḍāgādau labhyata iti māṣān khāditvāvaśiṣṭāñjāyāyai dattavān /
GSP33brssgo3u:6038: sā cānāpadgatā patyurāpadaṃ jñātvā māṣānsaṃrakṣya prātastasmai dadau /
GSP33brssgo3u:6039: sa ca tān khāditvā rājño yajñaṃ gatvā prastotrādīnākṣipya prāṇādikāṃ prāstāvādidevatāmupadīśya dhanaṃ prāpya sthita iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6040: atrocchiṣṭabhakṣaṇajalatyāgātmakaśiṣṭācāraliṅgācchrautādanāpadi viduṣāpyabhakṣyaṃ na bhakṣaṇīyamiti sūcyata iti bhāvaḥ //28 // //29//
GSP33brssgo3u:6046: lipyate na sa pāpena padmapatramivāmbhasā' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6052: surāpānenāpi jīvanamāśaṅkya kadāpi tanna kāryamityāha-tathā madyaṃ nityaṃ brahmaṇa iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6061: śabdaścānannasya pratiṣedhakaḥ kāmakāranivṛttiprayojanaḥ kāṭhakānāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ śrūyate - 'tasmādbrahmaṇaḥ surāṃ na pibet' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6062: so 'pi 'na ha vā evaṃvidi' (chā. 5.2.1) ityasyārthavādatvādupapannataro bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:6065: kāmakāro yatheṣṭapravṛttiḥ so 'pi niṣedho 'pi upapannataro bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:6067: yadyayamapi vidhiḥ syāttarhi vihitapratiṣiddhatvātṣoḍaśigrahaṇāgrahaṇavatsurāpāne vikalpaḥ syātsa ca sarvasmṛtibhiḥ śiṣṭācāreṇa ca viruddha iti tātparyārthaḥ //31//
GSP33brssgo3u:6074: idānīṃ tu kimamumukṣorapyaśramamātraniṣṭhasya vidyāmakāmamayamānasya tānyanuṣṭheyānyutāho neti cintyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:6076: ityādināśramakarmaṇāṃ vidyāsādhanatvena vihitatvādvidyāmanicchataḥ phalāntaraṃ kāmayamānasya nityanyananuṣṭheyāni /
GSP33brssgo3u:6077: atha tasyāpyanuṣṭheyāni na tarhyeṣāṃ vidyāsādhanatvaṃ nityānityasaṃyogavirodhāditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:6078: asyāṃ prāptau paṭhati - 'āśramamātraniṣṭhasyāpyamumukṣoḥ kartavyanyeva nityāni karmāṇi yāvajjīvamagnihotraṃ juhoti' ityādinā vihitatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:6083: tasyā anityatvādyāvajjīvādividhinā tu nityatvaṃ ceti viruddhadharmadvayāpātādvividiṣāśruteḥ stutitvamiti phalaṃ pūrvapakṣe /
GSP33brssgo3u:6088: atha yaduktaṃ naivaṃ sati vidyāsādhanatveṣāṃ syādityata uttaraṃ paṭhati -
GSP33brssgo3u:6090: vidyāsahakārīṇi caitāni syurvihitatvādeva 'tametaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti' (bṛ. 4.4.22) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:6095: vidhilakṣaṇaṃ hi sādhanaṃ darśapūrṇamāsādi svargaphalasiṣādhayiṣayā sahakārisādhanāntaramapekṣate naivaṃ vidyā /
GSP33brssgo3u:6099: nitye hyekaḥ saṃyogo yāvajjīvādivākyakalpito na tasya vidyāphalatvam /
GSP33brssgo3u:6102: yathaikasyāpi khādiratvasya nityena saṃyogena kratvarthatvamanityena saṃyogena puruṣārthatvaṃ tadvat // 33 //
GSP33brssgo3u:6103: saha militvā śuddhidvārā vidyāṃ kurvantīti sahakārīṇi karmāṇi /
GSP33brssgo3u:6107: ato vihitāni karmāṇi avihitāyā na sahakāryaṅgāni mokṣasyāsādhyatvācca na karmāṇāṃ sahakāritvasaṃbhava ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6109: kāmanāyā anityatve 'pi karmaṇāṃ nānityatvaṃ nityavidhinā prayogasya nityatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:6112: yathā 'khādiro yūpo bhavati'iti śrutyā khādiratvasya kratvarthatā khādiraṃ vīryakāmasyeti śrutyā puruṣārthatā ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6113: ataḥ sati vākyadvaye viniyuktaviniyogo na virudhyata ityarthaḥ //33//
GSP33brssgo3u:6118: sarvathāpyāśramakarmapakṣe vidyāsahakāritvapakṣe ca ta evāgnihotrādayo dharmā anuṣṭoyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6121: yathā kuṇḍapāyināmayane 'māsamagnihotraṃ jihoti' ityatra nityādagnihotrātkarmāntaramupadiśyate naivamiha karmabhedo 'stītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6125: iti siddhavadutpannarūpāṇyeva yajñādīni vividiṣāyāṃ viniyuṅ kte natu juhvatītyādivadapūrvameṣāṃ rūpamutpādayatīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6126: smṛtiliṅgamapi 'anāśritaḥ karmaphalaṃ kāryaṃ karma karoti yaḥ' (6.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:6128: yasyaite 'ṣṭācatvāriṃśatsaṃskārā ityādyā ca saṃskāratvaprasiddhirvaidikeṣu karmasu tatsaṃskṛtasya vidyotpattimabhipretya smṛtau bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:6130: nanu nityāgnihotrādibhyo bhinnā evāpūyarvajñādayo vividiṣāyāṃ viniyujyantāṃ tatra kuto viniyuktaviniyogastatrāha-sarvathāpīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6133: siddhakarmasu saṃskāratvaprasiddhirapi śuddhākhyasaṃskāradvārā jñānārthakakarmābhede liṅgamityāha-yasyaita iti //34//
GSP33brssgo3u:6138_1: rāgadibhiḥ kleśaiḥ 'eṣa hyātmā na naśyati yaṃ brahmacaryeṇānuvindate' (chā. 8.5.3) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:6139: tasmādyajñādīnyāśramakarmāṇi ca bhavanti vidyāsahakārīṇi ceti niścitam // 35 //
GSP33brssgo3u:6146: vidhurādīnāṃ dravyādisaṃpadrahitānāṃ cānyatamāśramapratipattihīnānāmantarālavartināṃ kiṃ vidyāyāmadhikāro 'sti kiṃvā nāstīti saṃśaye nāstīti tāvatprāptam /
GSP33brssgo3u:6148: evaṃ prāpta idamāha - antarā cāpi tvanāśramitvena vartamāno 'pi vidyāyāmadhikriyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:6154: anāśramiṇāṃ japādikarmasattvānninditatvācca saṃśaye sati āśramakarmaṇāmeva vidyāhetutvaśruteranāśramasya ninditatvāccānadhikāra iti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6160: nanu liṅgamidaṃ śrutismṛtidarśanamipanyastaṃ kā nu khalu prāptiriti sābhidhīyate -
GSP33brssgo3u:6163: tathāca smṛtiḥ - 'japyenaiva tu saṃsiddhyedbrāhmaṇo nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6164: kuryādantra vā kuryānmantro brāhmaṇa ucyate' ityasaṃbhavadāśramakarmāṇo 'pi japye 'dhikāraṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:6170: raikvādīnāṃ vidyāvattvaliṅgasya janmāntarāśramakarmaṇānyathāsiddheranāśramakarmaṇo vidyārthatvaprāpakaṃ mānāntaraṃ vācyamiti śaṅkate-nanu liṅgamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6173: nanvanāśramiṇāṃ karma bhavatu vidyāhetustathāpi teṣāṃ na śravaṇādāvadhikāraḥ saṃnyāsābhāvādityata āha-dṛṣṭārthā ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6175: saṃnyāso 'pi kadācitkṛto jñāna upakaroti śravaṇaṃ pratyanaṅgatvāditi bhāvaḥ //38//
GSP33brssgo3u:6179: atas tv itarajjyāyo liṅgāc ca | BBs_3,4.39 |
GSP33brssgo3u:6184: saṃvatsaramanāśramī sthitvā kṛcchramekaṃ caret' iti ca smṛtiliṅgāt // 39 //
GSP33brssgo3u:6187: atra puṇyakṛttvaliṅgādāśramitvaṃ jyāyaḥ puṇyopacaye śīghraṃ vidyālābhādanāśramasya ninditatvācceti bhāvaḥ //39//
GSP33brssgo3u:6192: tadbhūtasya tu nātadbhāvo jaiminer api niyamāt tadrūpābhāvebhyaḥ | BBs_3,4.40 |
GSP33brssgo3u:6194: tāṃstu prāptasya kathañcittataḥ pracyutirasti nāsti veti saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6195: pūrvakarmasvanuṣṭhānacikīrṣayā vā rāgādivaśena vā pracyuto 'pi syādviśeṣābhāvāditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:6196: evaṃ prāpta ucyate - tadbhūtasya tu pratipannordhvaretobhāvasya na kathañcidapyatadbhāvo na tataḥ pracyutiḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:6199: iti 'araṇyamiyāditi padaṃ tato na punareyādityupaniṣat' iti 'ācāryeṇābhyanujñātaścaturṇāmekamāśramam /
GSP33brssgo3u:6200: ā vimokṣāccharīrasya so 'nutiṣṭhedyathāvidi' iti caivañjātīyake niyamaḥ pracyutyaprabhāvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:6205: yattu pūrvakarmasvanuṣṭhānacikīrṣayā pratyavarohaṇamiti tadasat 'śreyānsvadharmo viguṇaḥ paradharmātsvanuṣṭhitāt' (3.35) iti smaraṇāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:6207: yo hi yaṃ prati vidhīyate sa tasya dharmo natu yo yena svanuṣṭhātuṃ śakyate /

GSP33brssgo3u:6357: tatra saṃśayaḥ maunaṃ vidīyate na veti /

GSP33brssgo3u:6363: apicāmaunaṃ ca maunaṃ ca nirvidyātha brāhmaṇa ityatra tāvanna brāhmaṇatvaṃ vidhīyate prāgeva prāptatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:6364: tasmādatha brāhmaṇa iti praśaṃsāvadastathaivātha munirityapi bhavitumarhati samānanirdeṣatvāditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:6372: nanu muniśabda uttamāśramavacano 'pi śrūyate 'gārhasthyamācāryakulaṃ maunaṃ vānaprastham' ityatra /
GSP33brssgo3u:6375: itarāśramasaṃnidhānāttu pāriśeṣyāttatrottamāśramopādānaṃ jñānapradhānatvādutmāśramasyaṣa tasmādbālyapāṇḍityāpekṣayā tṛtīyamidaṃ maunaṃ jñānātiśayarūpaṃ vidīyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:6376: yattu bālya eva vidheḥ paryavasānamiti tathāpyapūrvatvānmunitvasya vidheyatvāmāśrīyate muniḥ syāditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:6380: tadadhikārāt 'ātmānaṃ viditvā putrādyeṣaṇābhyo vyutthāyātha bhikṣācaryaṃ caranti' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6381: nanu sati vidyāvattve prāpnotyeva tatrātiśayaḥ kiṃ monavidhinetyata āha - pakṣeṇeti /

GSP33brssgo3u:6388_0: yasmātpūrve brāhmaṇā ātmānaṃ viditvā saṃnyasya bhikṣācaryaṃ caranti tasmādadyatano

GSP33brssgo3u:6389: maunaśabdasya siddharūpe pārivrājye anuṣṭheye ca dhyāne prayogātsaṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6390: yathā taṃ ha baka ityādivākyaśeṣādudgīthādyupāsanasyārtvijyatvanirṇayastadvadatha brāhmaṇa iti vidhihīnavākyaśeṣānmaunasyāpyavidheyatvaniścaya iti pūrvapakṣamāha-na vidhīyata iti /

GSP33brssgo3u:6403: sūkṣmārthasākṣātkārasādhanatvena dhyānādeḥ ṣaḍjādau lokataḥ prāptiṃ śaṅkitvā niyamavidhimāha-nanvityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:6404: nanu brahmavidyāpare vākye kathaṃ jñānāṅgamiti cetsaphalakratuparavākye 'ṅgavidhivadityāha-vidhyādivaditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:6406: tatra pradhānaḥ kraturvidhyādirata evāṅgaṃ vidhyanta ityucyata ityarthaḥ /

GSP33brssgo3u:6418: bahulāyāsāni hi bahūnyāśramakarmāṇi yajñādīni taṃ prati kartavyatayopadiṣṭānyāśramāntarakarmāṇi ca yathāsaṃbhavamahiṃsendriyasaṃyamādīni tasya vidyante /
GSP33brssgo3u:6420: samāvartanānantaraṃ kuṭumbe sthito brahmalokaṃ prāpnoti naca punarāvartata ityupasaṃhārātsaṃnyāso nāstīti śaṅkārthaḥ /

GSP33brssgo3u:6449: aviruddhe hyanyasminbālyaśabdābhilapye labhyamāne na vidhyantaravyāghātakalpanā yuktā /

GSP33brssgo3u:6464: tatra bālye viṣaye taddhitasya bhāvārthatvāsaṃbhavātkarmārthatvaṃ gṛhītvā tiṣṭhanmūtratvādikarmaṇo 'prarūḍhendriyatvādirūpabhāvaśuddheśca bālakarmatvāviśeṣātsaṃśayamāha-tatreti /

GSP33brssgo3u:6471: na sa tatpadamāpnoti saṃsāraṃ cādhigacchati'ityādi śaucabhikṣādiniyamavidhiśāstrāviruddhasya bhāvaśuddhākhyabālyasya vidhisaṃbhavānna yatheṣṭaceṣṭāvidhiriti siddhāntayati-evamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6481: tatphalaṃ vidyā siddhyantī kimihaiva janmani siddhyatyuta kadācidamutrāpīti cnavtyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:6486: naca kaścidamutra me vidyā jāyatāmityabhisaṃdhāya śravaṇādiṣu pravartate /
GSP33brssgo3u:6487: samāna eva tu janmani vidyājanmābhisaṃdhāyaiteṣu pravartamāno dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:6490: evaṃ prāpte vadāmaḥ - aihikaṃ vidyājanma bhavatyasati prastutapratibandha iti /

GSP33brssgo3u:6498: nacāviśeṣeṇa vidyāyāmabhisaṃdhirnotpadyata ihāmutra vā me vidyā jāyatāmityabhisaṃdherniraṅ kuśatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:6500: tathācaśrutirdurbodhatvamātmano darśayati - 'śravaṇāyāpi bahubhiryo na labhyaḥ śṛṇvanto 'pi bahavo yaṃ na vidyuḥ /

GSP33brssgo3u:6507: 6.43) ityādinā 'anekajanmasaṃsiddhastato yāti parāṃ gatim' (gī. 6.45) ityetenaitadeva darśayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:6509: aihikamapi saṃnyāsādibālyāntaṃ sādhanajātamuktvā tatsādhyavidyājanma vicāryata iti saṃgatiṃ vadan sādhanasya dvidhā phalasaṃbhavātsaṃśayamāha-sarvetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:6512: śuddhidvārā yajñādibhiḥ śravaṇādiṣu sākṣādvidyāhetuṣu ghaṭiteṣu vidyāvilambo na yuktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6513: dṛśyate ca vilambaḥ ataḥ śravaṇādervidyāhetutvamasiddhamiti pūrvapakṣe phalam /
GSP33brssgo3u:6514: pratibandhakavaśādvilambe 'pi hetutvasiddhiriti siddhānte phalaṃ matvā citrādivadaniyataphalaṃ śravaṇādikamiti siddhāntayati-evamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6515: nanu prārabdhakarmaviśeṣeṇa śravaṇādiphalapratibandhaḥ kimiti kriyate śravaṇādinaiva karmavipākapratibandhaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-upasthitavipākatvaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6517: tena śravaṇādikameva kimiti na vipacyante, tatrāha-yāni ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6521: tathāpi karmaṇaiva śravaṇādipratibandho na vaiparītyamityatra ko hetustamāha-sādhaneti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6533: yathā mumukṣorvidyāsādhanāvalambinaḥ sādhanavīryaviśeṣādvidyalakṣaṇe phala aihikāmuṣmikaphalatvakṛto viśeṣapratiniyamo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6536: na khalu muktiphale kaścidevaṃbhūto viśeṣapratiniyama āśaṅkitavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6547: apica vidyāsādhanaṃ svavīryaviśeṣāsvaphala eva vidyāyāṃ kañcidatiśayamāsañjayenna vidyāphale muktau /
GSP33brssgo3u:6549: naca tasyāmapyutkarṣanikarṣātmako 'tiśaya upapadyate nikṛṣṭāyā vidyātvābhāvādutkṛṣṭaiva hi vidyā bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:6555: ityādyāsu guṇāvāpodvāpavaśādbhedopapattau satyāmupapadyate yathāsvaṃ phalabhedaniyamaḥ karmaphalavat /
GSP33brssgo3u:6556: tathāca liṅgadarśanam - 'taṃ yathā yathopāsate tadeva bhavati' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6558: tathāca smṛtiḥ - 'nahi gatiradhikāsti kasyacitsati hi guṇe pravadantyatulyatām' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6560: asati prārabdhakarmapratibandhe śravaṇādinehaiva vidyodayaḥ yajñādibhiḥ saṃcitapāpapratibandhasya nirastatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:6561_0: sati tu bhogena tannirāsādamutreti vidyāyā aihikāmuṣmikatvaviśeṣaniyama uktastadvatphale
GSP33brssgo3u:6563: tasyāṃ vidyāvadviśeṣaniyamo 'sti na veti phalasyobhayathāsaṃbhavātsaṃśaye pūrvapakṣamāha-yatheti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6564: muktiḥ saviśeṣā, phalatvādvidyāvadataḥ karmasādhyā muktiriti phalam /
GSP33brssgo3u:6566: kiñca śravaṇāditāratamyādvidyāyāṃ kañcidatiśayamaṅgīkṛtya vidyālabhyamuktau nātiśaya ityāha-apica vidyāsādhanamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6569: vidyayābhivyaktatvena brahmānanda eva mukhyaphalamabhivyaktiravidyānivṛttirānandasvarūpasphūrtipratibandhakābhāvatayā vidyayā sādhyate sā cānirvācyeti na dvaitāpattiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6579: kathaṃ tarhi pūrvādhikaraṇe vidyāyā viśeṣa uktaḥ, tatrāha-tasmāditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:6580: satyāmapi sāmagryāṃ jñāne vilamba ukto na tāratamyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6581: tarhi satyapi jñāne muktau vilambaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-natviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6582: vāyvādipratibandhāddipotpattivilambe 'pyutpanne tamonivṛttivilambādarśanātsati jñāne nājñānanivṛttau vilamba iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6583: kiñca karmaṇāmupāsanānāṃ ca guṇabhedena tāratamyātphalatāratamyaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:6590: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatkṛtau śārīrakavyākhyāyā bhāṣyaratnaprabhāṭīkāyāṃ tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //4//
